reviewText:
I received the Timeson Womens Short Sleeve Faux Twinset Design Summer Tunic Tops Blouse free for my review. I am IN LOVE with this top! From the moment I put it on. Even though I got it free for review I take my reviews very seriously. I am a fashion blogger and so what I say here is vital to my blogging. In fact I love this top so much it will make an appearance ON my blog in the near future!
It fit as expected - I ordered an XXL - I am five foot 3 inches, 140 pounds and have a 38DD chest and larger arms.
At first the arms were a tiny bit tight but I stretched them out a little which was easy to do and it looks great! Fit perfect in the chest area. LOVE the draping look and the black sleeves almost look like I have a shrug on top of the blouse due to the way it is stitched on - its like a visual effect.
Good seaming - no unraveling.
Fabric is nice - the fabric on the black section feels different from that of the maroon section.
The maroon section is double layered so you do not need a cami underneath.
It breathes well which is important since I am pre-menopasual I get hot flashes and I am feeling cool and comfortable in this top.
It just is so complimentary to a larger frame too which I love. The billowing look from the rouching is a nice thing to cover a belly if you have one too.
I love the color!
Looks great with jeans, or can easily be dressed up which I will show when I do my blog article - I already have several ideas! Just change your bottoms and shoes and you can easily wear to office, casual or fancy dinner date, or just out and about running errands!
I will update with better photos once I get the time to take them for my blog article.
In the mean time have uploaded a collage with some selfies.
As always IF I have any issues in the near future I will update this review.
summary: Gorgeous top that can be dressed up or down with ease! LOVE!

reviewText:
Received this bag in record time, and love it. The packaging left something to be desired, so if ordering it for a gift I would take it out of the bag and wrap it flat in tissue in a shirt box or gift bag.
I like how the design on the outside is a little more stylish. This bag is very large and can hold quite a bit. Plan on taking it as my personal carry on bag on flights. Love the crossbody strap, and how versitile this bag is. The crossbody strap is thick with excellent  caribiner clips. There are two slip pockets inside for phone and keys, as well as two inside zip pockets. One for cash/ coins, and one a bit larger that my kindle voyage will fit inside (about 4x6").
Only downside is that it is a floppy bag and will not stand up on its own. However hardware looks like good quality and the zipper is heavy duty with a thick quality pull.  The leather accents are very pretty. For the price, a great bag to take on a plane as it will go with any outfit, and can easily be squashed down under the seat. The large top zipper is definately a great feature. Will look amazing stuffed. I'm 5'4", as shown in the photos.

I love this hat!  It has a really nice wide 3 1/2" brim - the most important feature to me! I have extremely sensitive eyes and need good protection from the sun.  It also fits me perfectly.  My husband really liked the look of it and wanted one too, but it is too small for his head.  With the mesh sides and pony tail hole, it has good ventilation.  I did not give it 5 stars due to the chin strap which comes in very handy when it's windy outside.  When you tighten it, it stretches.  I have learned to really pull down in the strap while pushing the clip up under my chin to get it tight.  Overall, I highly recommend this hat for anyone who needs/wants to protect their eyes from the sun.

Love this hat. The seller, however, is colorblind. The "red" is more of a magenta or dark pink. I wish this hat came in more standard and neutral colors like black, khaki, cream, etc. because I love it and I'd have one of every ordinary, flexible color. It would also be nice if the gray area of the hat was black, then at least part of the hat is a "crossover color" fashionwise. Maybe most women don't care if their hats match their outfits, but I do. The functional design of this hat is awesome, I love that it adjusts size (slide buckle) and the strap has a barrel lock. Really great hat, so it gets five stars regardless of color deficiencies which are indeed a matter of preference.
summary: Awesome hat, color is anyone's guess...

reviewText: This Lingerie Mini Dress I ordered in the Purple in a size Large for my daughter but I should have probably ordered her the XL. According to the size chart, this should have fit for her size but unfortunately it was a bit small. With that being said, I am removing a star for the sizing issue. Now while she was able to get this on, it was too snug for her around her stomach and mid-section. Her breasts fit ok and the length was what I believe it was supposed to be even though she is a taller girl standing at 5 9 tall. We all know that us women are all different shapes and carry our weight differently. My daughter normally wears a size Large (or a 12-14) but this didn't work for her. On the hand, depending on someone else is proportioned, it may work for them. I however would personally recommend ordering a size up. With something like this, it couldn't hurt. As for the material and the mini dress lingerie itself, its super pretty and the rose pattern in the lace is adorable. The straps even though this says strapless, are lace and can be worn as straps or worn down further on the arms and not on the shoulders. It just depends what you feel you like and looks nice. There is a little bit of elasticity in the straps. There is not much stretch in the lace to the dress part though. I also do want to mention, the color in the stock photo is more true to the color you get than what my video is showing. Im not sure why my video is making it look more like a light lavender/lilac color but it is almost more of a pinkish color like the stock photo. I checked this over very well and did not find any holes or flaws in the lace at all. I have purchased similar items before and sometimes there is a hole in the lace but nothing found with this one. This comes with a G-string/thong type panty also to wear underneath. Now that did fit my daughter as expected. There is a cute satin bow that is attached in the center of the breast area with an peep hole which I think really adds to this and makes it real sexy to see the cleavage there. Wearing this for your man will definitely grab his attention. I received this product with a promotional discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. No compensation for a positive review was provided. All of my reviews are based 100% off of my experience with the product and I never guarantee a positive review.

I don't like it when a shirt is too tight on the arms and this shirt is not tight on the arms at all.  It is form fitting but not tight in the torso.  I am 5'3", 115 lb. and have a 26" waist, 32D bust and I ordered a medium.  The color shows on my computer screen as more of a mossy green but in person it is more of a brighter green like Chartreuse. The fit on the model shown is accurate to my experience when wearing the shirt.

Overall it is an okay jacket. It is a fairly cheap polyester windbreaker, but seems well made in China.

It is a bit large. I am generally a size Medium, as a 140 5' 9" male, so this is what I ordered (a "U.S. Medium"). Apparently this translates to a Chinese Double XL.  It isn't WAY too big (see photos), but I was hoping for more of a fitted look.

That said, it is a nice color and fits okay. The zippers seems are well constructed, and I like that it has an inner chest pocket. I'm not sure how well it will hold up, due to most seems being single-stitched, but for the moment it's decent.

While not fully waterproof, it is water resistant. and does a good job of blocking wind (it is a few layers thick).

reviewText: this jacket comes in its own little stuff sack...we prob will never get it back in...but its cool! daughter loves the jacket and it fits perfectly as expected. size small
This is exactly what I have been looking for. Fits great and has enough room to layer.

So... here's the deal... I don't think you will win any fashion awards with these jacket, but you will will function awards. The fit isn't incredibly flattering, at least on me. The jacket looks a little more shapely in the product photos. But.. maybe if you're a little more shapely, it will look the same on you- haha! Anyhow.. I usually wear around a size 4-6US and I ordered the small. I think this was the appropriate size for me. Any smaller and the arms and waist lengths would be too short and any larger and it would be too billowy. If you just need a lightweight rain jacket with a hood, I think this is a great option. It rolls up super compactly, making it great for travel and storage. Either keep it in your purse, suitcase, backpack etc, or you could use a carabiner clip to attach it to the outside of your bag, or even a pantloop if you are going for a walk and not bringing a big bag. The coat is cinched around the wrists and waist. I assume this helps keep the water out. The waist cinching is adjustable. The jacket zips up tall, which is great for rain protection. There is a hood as well that is adjustable. If you really cinch it up and pull up the front of the jacket as in the picture, very little will be exposed to the elements. Thumbs up for that. Don't want to forget that there are also pockets on each side of the jacket that zipper shut. This is a really functional jacket and definitely looks better than a garbage back or a poncho if you get caught in the rain haha. It has some good features and for me the best 2 features are the hood and the packability of this. I am always on the go in day-to-day life and traveling, so this is an ideal way to cover the possibility of rain without taking up too much space. I received this jacket for free to test and review based on my personal opinion of it. Shades are: Swell Vision Alani Coffee Brown Bamboo Sunglasses with Smoke Lens

reviewText: Very flattering dress for my ample curves and 5'4" height.  The draw string cinches right below the breast making your waist appear small.  The v-neck helps to elongate and the colors are beautiful.  The material is a nice, light fabric.  I may have gotten one that was made longer than others because I'll need to hem this at least 2 inches, but I hate to lose that pattern at the bottom.  Not sure whether I will return yet or not.  Don't understand how other reviewers who are around my height have dresses that are the right length.

This dress is really cute! For reference, I am 5'3", 130-135 pounds, 34E and wear a size 8 or medium. I bought a large in this dress since it's not a knit material and I wanted to make sure it fit my chest. It fits well but a medium may have worked too. I'm keeping the large though. You can cinch it under the bust as much or as little as you'd like to get the best fit. It creates a very flattering silhouette. The v-neck is low but not too low so I don't need to wear a cami underneath it. With flat shoes, the dress drags the floor about a half inch. With 3 inch heels the length is perfect maxi length. So if you are really tall and want a true maxi dress, this may be too short for you. I was worried that it would be too long for me because I wouldn't be able to get it hemmed because of the design at the bottom. But it works just fine with heels. The green and blue colors are much more vibrant than the picture shows and that's my only real complaint about it. I prefer the softer green that it looks like on screen but it is still very pretty. Overall, I really like it and wold highly recommend it!

Update: just bought another dress in mint and it's my favorite so far! These are great dresses! I've got 3 of them now and the mint color is by far my favorite. Absolutely beautiful shades of mint/jade and the fit has improved. The back waistline is elastisized so moving my arms is easier now. I've actually ordered medium and it fits perfectly. Still highly recommend these dresses

reviewText:
So I bought this for my husband to use for hunting or whatever reason he wants. He just loves camo and seen this and wanted it so I decided to get it for him. I like how there were multiple camo designs to choose from but he liked this one the most. It got here fairly quickly and he was pretty happy with it. It fit just right and it was not itchy or irritate his face at all. In fact it was extremely soft and really comfortable. He even used it under his motorcycle helmet riding and it fit pretty well under his helmet and it kept his face warm. It is great material and we did not have any problems with it shrinking or anything like that once we put it in the wash and dryer. He is pretty happy with it and it is for a really good price. I would say to definitely give it a try. The packaging it came in was clearly from china but I mean what isn't nowadays. It is not super expensive and it really is a quality fleece face mask. I would highly suggest purchasing this one if you are looking for something like this. it is good to have and it would really come in handy during the winter season. You could even use it snowboarding and it would work perfectly. You have the fastens on the sides to make it tighter or even make it loose so that is a nice touch as well. We really like it a lot and would recommend it to everyone. We actually got a few of them as gifts for his family. They loved them as well so that was nice!

*I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.*

This is a great fleece Balaclava, I immediately liked it from the minute I opened it. All the stitching is done very well, as well as great functioning draw strings. The fabric is overall outstanding, its not itchy on your face or neck like most fleece products. The multiple uses on this is great, I normally use this as a neck gator to keep the wind of my neck. I really love this product as I am an avid outdoorsman it will get used a lot, either while I'm sitting in the woods during hunting season or out on the boat fishing. If I have on complaint abut the Balaclava is that I feel the face hole is a little small for me and is a bit of squeeze to fit my head through, and yes I have a normal size head....at least I think so... All in all the overall quality of this product is outstanding and I would recommend it to any of my hunting or fishing buddies.
I did receive this product at a discounted rate for my unbiased and honest review.

I purchased this for my 15 year old son for winter use in upstate NY. When my husband saw it, he asked if he could have it. It is so well made. The fleece is very thick. The stitching is great. This balaclava is very high quality and worth the cost. You can tighten it with the cable so it fits very snug on your face to protect it from the wind and snow. It has length to cover your neck under your coat if snow comes in. This was a great purchase. Way better than I expected it to be made.

I received this item at a discount for a fair and honest review, which I have provided. We absolutely love everything about this. Would recommend to anyone in the cold weather states.
summary: Outstanding, well made. Worth the purchase.

This mask is pretty incredible. I used it over my entire face and left it on as directed. It was kind of difficult to get it peeled up to remove. That was harder than I expected, but not a huge deal. Once I finally got the entire mask off my skin felt absolutely incredible! Super soft and smooth. It definitely removed all the dead skin and a lot of whitehead/blackheads from my entire face. I will say this though, removing it felt a lot like removing a band aid that has been severely stuck to your arm or leg hair. I had to just rip it off eventually because doing it little by little was taking too long and it was kinda painful. So I tried the whole "rip it off like a band aid" and that wasn't the most pleasant experience. However, it was definitely worth it to get that amazingly smooth skin. So even after that I would recommend this product to people, so long as they know the removal part may be difficult or painful.
Omg this is so much better than biore strips. This aslo gets the job done. Only hurts because its pulling out all of the white heads. Very happy left me skin smooth clear and clean. Buying it again

reviewText:
This is such a GORGEOUS top, I absolutely love it!! Famulily did a superb job with their women's vintage embroidery crocheted lace top, it is simply beautiful, classy, flattering , soft, and definitely good quality. This was such a great find!

Fit/ Style
I was a little hesitant at first regarding the fit, as this is a one size fits all. Once my top arrived, I could not wait to try it on, and boom, it fit perfectly! This is an extremely flattering shape and shows off my shoulders nicely. The design is very classy and will not go out of style, with a very unique draping, it falls right in place. It design covers any flaws you may have without making you look pregnant.
What's great about this style, is that you can wear this casually with jeans, semi dressy with a skirt, professional with dress pants, or dressy with skirt and high heels... very versatile!
Around the neckline is embroidered area of flower detailing. It's very pretty and eye catching with sparkles. I cannot wear necklaces due to skin issues, but this is the next best thing!

Fabric/ Quality
One of the first things I noticed when I took the top out of the package, was how SOFT and silky it feels. There are two layers, the bottom being solid color while the overlay draping is sheer ,allowing the drape to have a flawless light flow movement.
Famulily really put some thought and time into the top. The quality is there. All the seams are stitched well and even. There iare no holes or loose threads anywhere. This top will definitely not fall apart on you, if you care for it properly, it will last.

The only mistake in my transaction, was that I ordered the pink and recieved the black. To be honest, I am so happy with this top, I am completely fine with it and didn't even bother contacting the seller. It was a happy mistake. Also, I must say that shipping was much faster than I expected, it arrived about a week earlier than the promised date.

Overall, by my review, I'm sure you can tell that I am in love with this top. I would HIGHLY recommend this top to anyone who is looking for a fabulous high quality classy look. Believe me, you will not regret it!

Wen I purchased this i was unsure how the quality would be for the price. I read many reviews and  decided I would give this a chance, besides it is cheep so if I didn't like it, it wouldn't have been too much of a hit to the pocket. But it turned out to be much better than I expected. I was pleasantly surprised to see such great quality for a for a fraction of the competitors. I read a lot of the reviews and many complained about the smell, but what I found is that it smells of quality leather. It's a pleasant smell to me. I also read that it can be a bit stiff. I bought both the black one and the brown one. The black was a touch stiff but after wearing it the first day the stiffness is all but gone. The brown was soft already. I think the black was probably a bit stiff from the dye. The snaps are okay. They are easily taken apart but not to a point that it would come open on its own. I have a bit of a thick wrist and was confused about the size. What I didn't realize ( but should have) is that it wraps around the wrist twice. I still have room and I could snap it tighter but I like it loose. It might be a bit big for a small wrist, but comfortable for a large wrist. I love this and wear it every day. Over all I am extremely satisfied with this product. I had thought high price meant quality, but in this case, I'm glad I was wrong.

First of all the size chart listed for this is not American sizing!!!! It's a beautiful dress. But if your a size maybe 8 and order the XL it will be ok. I ordered the size XL 16 /18 and it doesn't even cover my boobs. I'm throughly angry to say the least.
I don't think it will be worth it to send it back to Asia where it came from.
I REALLY wish that amazon executives would put restrictions on the sellers and only allow them to sell clothing if it's according to the US size charts. This is the second time I've ordered something that was from over seas that although absolutely beautiful, is not according to the size charts listed. The skirt I ordered before was about a size too small and funny thing they included a US tape measure but the 1"was actually 3/4 inches. Yeah, that added up. Lol
Its really sad. They have such beautifully printed fabrics and I love the styles but when the size chart is wrong from the beginning and their measurements are off, your taking a chance when ordering.
As much as I adore Amazon, the shipping, choices, etc. I think they are not managing this portion of things correctly and need to get a handle on it so they can satisfy the customers. And even if the supplyers have to charge a bit more for more fabric use and come to code for the US sizing, I'd be happy to pay it so I don't end up having something I paid for but can't wear unless I starved myself for two years. Lol
summary: Sizing isn't based on US size chart!

The top is strapless and padded but comes with tie straps that can be attached to the suit and tied around the neck. The bottoms are a thinner cut and are by no means full coverage in the back. Holding them up the front and back are cut the same. There are ties on the side to loosen and tighten up the bottoms. Overall I really like the quality and style of this bathing suit and the fit is what I would have expected for my wife. Another cool thing is the fringe on the top, it looks cool. reviewText:
My upper ribs are visible and it's pretty unsightly, so I was so happy to see this style of bathing suit. It's super flattering and it's fully lined and padded so there's no poking through the top. That being said, I feel like the top is a little big and needs adjusting. My underbust measurement is 25 inches/bust measurement 31 inches and I feel like it would easily billow out if I'm doing anything other than hanging out dry. I'll have to adjust it on the sewing machine since there are no ties and there aren't any adjustable clasps, either. And it might be because I'm very short, but the halter straps are much too long. I'll also have to adjust that as well.

The bottom is awesome. It's bordering on being a little too small, but I'd rather have it be a teeny bit snug than too loose. My hip measurement is 34". For reference, I'm 5'0" and 90lbs, but my butt is rather big for my frame. Keep in mind, though, if you have the teensiest of extra padding on your hips or waist area, the straps will dig into them and accentuate them!

I bought this bathing suit at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

reviewText:
I wanted this bikini to work out more than it did, but it's not a bad suit overall. I have a small frame, so I'm a bit smaller in the chest and that was where I had a problem: the halter top design, while cute, went a little too low on the sides and so makes me feel that if I do any sort of running or exert any kind of exercise swimming, I might have a wardrobe malfunction. If the top came with adjustable straps instead of the elastic material, this would be a five-star suit for sure. I might have someone alter it because I want to give this bathing suit a try.

Also, I guess I assumed too much from the picture, but I assumed that the top design was going to be embroidered. I was mistaken; instead, it is part of the pattern of the bathing suit itself. Okay, that's not such a big deal--the colors are still bright and the pattern is there, but it is not quite what we see in the picture. The top comes with removable pads that you may or may not want in the suit, depending on your preference. For me, they didn't really make much of a difference, so I left them in.

The bottom, on the other hand, fit me perfectly and looks really cute! I love the side cutouts, they're sexy without being too vulgar. I might even change up the bikini tops with some others to go with this bottom; because it's black it's super versatile.

I have not had a chance to field test this bikini at the beach or pool, but I plan on doing so soon. Overall, the fit is a little weird for my body type on top, but I still like the pattern and the style and think that it's a pretty good quality for a knockoff coming from China.

** I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. My opinions are 100% my own and not influenced in any way by this exchange. **

Ok, here goes my first Amazon review.  Too bad it has to be so negative.  I will be civil in the hopes that my comments will survive to warn other hapless buyers.  It is totally counterfeit.  Period.  The fabric is so thin that you could use it as black vale at a funeral.  The logo might be OK if you had 20/70 vision and it was observed at twilight from a distance.  There are three colors that are so badly aligned it looks like you should be viewing the shirt with 3-D glasses.  The term transition is more appropriate then edge to describe the image clarity.  I could have done a better job with some Sharpies and a twelve pack of Pabst.  Really?  This is the shirt that is supposed to express my wifes affinity towards an iconic Italian motorcycle brand to the world? This is the shirt that is supposed to be a Christmas gift to let her know how much I enjoyed our ride to Wyoming. Really? BTW, I ordered it in early/mid December and it showed up via China Post on January 11.  I forgot it was coming!  $24 (including shipping) for a rag to clean the mud off the wheels of my Jeep.  So now you are warned, an advantage I did not have.  Happy trails!

reviewText:
Let's start by saying I've never written a negative review. I have four kids, I don't have time for that.

The dress came today for my daughter's 3rd birthday party and it's terrible. The packaging had the dress smashed into a little ball. There's a definite gap between the top layer of the dress and the bottom layers, making it look cheap. The back and bottom are cut uneven. There are strings hanging out all over the dress and unfinished hems. The pearls are loose and I'm sure they will fall off immediately.

I'm very upset because I wanted her to have a new "pretty purple" dress for her party, as she requested, and now I'm going to have to put her in one of her older dresses.

reviewText: SUPER CUTE!  I used this size conversion chart to buy my dress.  I bought a 110 for my niece for a wedding, who is probably a 3T-4T, and it fit her fine.  It's probably about a size 5 (which is what the conversion chart indicates), but it did not drag the floor or anything like that.  I'd say it went down to mid-calf and the arm holes were not too big.  You could see her socks and mary janes.  It fluffed up pretty nicely after we took it out of the bag and hung it upside down overnight.  EVERYONE loved this dress!  She looked like an upside-down cupcake.  :)  It was much better quality than I expected as well. There, are little pearls stitched along the neckline, and the yolk of the bodice is ruched.  Well worth the money and all of the compliments that ensued.

:Review Update:

Before writing the first review, I had been super excited that the bead actually glowed in the dark - so many 'glow' products don't. However, I noticed a little while later that the pendant was damaged (part of the cage was bent; the metal is extremely delicate and cheaply made). I decided that was okay, it wasn't really noticeable. Then I tried to wear it, and found out that the clasp is so tiny that it's nearly impossible to re-hook. I had to hang the pendant on a spare chain just to be able to wear it. I wouldn't recommend this if you're looking for a really nice piece of jewelry, and I probably would have sent it back but it wasn't worth the trouble to ship. But hey...at least it glows.

The bracelet came in a little gift-wrapped looking box with a thank you card from them which makes it ideal to give as a gift for someone. The blue kyanite was pretty in contrast with the onyx beads. The beads and kyanite had a certain feel to it which showed its amazing quality. I tried scratching the beads with my fingernail to see if it would wear out quickly, but it didn't. It has a bit of a squeaking sound, but I assume will wear off the more it's worn. Upon buying, I didn't realize that the bracelet size was a bit too big for me. The thank you card had an email if you needed help with a problem or not. I emailed them asking if there was a way I could get the bracelet adjusted; as a result, they replied fairly quickly and helped me with my problem by willing to send me a customized bracelet for my wrist size. Overall, the bracelet is worth the money and if you ever run into a problem with the bracelet, don't hesitate to email them and they will help you solve your problem quickly.

reviewText:
These socks are just what I was looking for...although I had no idea that they existed until I saw them here on Amazon.
I do not do yoga, and the reason I was looking for toe less socks is that I often wear toe spreaders (yes, they definitely work!) to correct bunions and hammertoes, and I don't want to go bare foot all the time. In addition to getting dirty, my feet tend to get rough when I go bare foot for too long, and that presents a whole new rough, dry foot problem to deal with.
I do have some toe less socks, and some regular toe socks, but they are not open on top. I like the open top, as they are cooler and more forgiving of a wide foot, which is what I have. If you haven't noticed...I have foot issues.
Anything that helps my level of foot comfort is very welcome, and I will continue to use this type of sock.
I would not hesitate to recommend these to anyone who is interested in this type of sock.
My dear husband has recently begun to use toe spreaders as well, and I am thinking these might work for him as well, due to the open tops.
They seem well constructed (though certainly not what I would consider premium, thus the four star instead of five), feel good on my feet, and they launder well.
I put them in the washer and dryer both, as soon as I got them, and they came out in great shape.
I'm glad that I bought them.
I received these socks at a discount, in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

These are the first pairs of "yoga" socks I have every purchased. I *love* them. The fit is perfect. Be aware that the first few times you wear them, you may need to tug a bit to get each toe in place -- but once they are on, they are "comfy". I use the socks for yoga but I've found that they are also great "around the house socks". The grips on the bottom make sure that my feet don't slip on wood or tile. I even use them for "sleeping socks" because they cover my feet enough to keep them comfortable and having the open top and open toes means that my feet don't overheat in the night. No more sticking my feet out from under the covers to get cool!! They also keep their shape and don't overstretch. They also have the cutest inspirational yoga saying on the bottom. Great inspiration for me -- or anyone who is behind me in yoga class. The colors are lovely. They wash well by hand or in the washing machine (if the latter, I always air dry them. Recommended. I received this item free and/or at a discount in exchange for using it and providing my honest, unbiased feedback - which I give on *all* items I review, regardless of purchase price. All opinions are my own. I have not been compensated further. I *never* guarantee a positive review.

I'll be honest: I don't do yoga, and I don't really dance much. I DO have a unique sense of style, and these adorable little socks play into that really well.

 What I learned from using it - If there's any doubt about the colors offered, the truth is that the seller picks three random colors to send when you purchase this item. I would have liked to choose my colors, personally, but in my case I ended up with my three favorite possible colors: Black, grey, and light purple. Now, I have somewhat large feet (size 10/11 women's, 9ish men's) so at first wear these are somewhat tight, but after wearing my black pair for a week or so, on and off, they are far more comfortable now.

 How good is it, really? Well they're adorable, I love the fingerless gloves concept and these play into that in a very unusual and quirky manner. I also find that I'm not usually fond of toe socks because they make my toes too warm, but the "toeless" socks are the perfect solution. The opening at the top is both cute and keeps my feet a little cooler, too (I tend to have hot feet) and there are rubbery dots underneath the feet that grip the floor well but also are substantial enough that I feel like I'm walking on very small and widely spaced pebbles. Also on the bottom in the middle of the foot are the words "Enjoy Yoga," which doesn't exactly apply to me but is cute nonetheless. It bothered me at first, but I got used to it. Either way, I absolutely love them.

In summary, these socks are unique and quirky and adorable. I'm not honestly sure how they would be for yoga or dancing, since I do neither of these things, but I can tell you that they are comfy and fun for wearing around the house and relaxing on chilly days. I'm super happy I bought them, and would happily recommend them to anyone looking for some cute workout/dance/yoga/chill-around-the-house socks!

For disclosure purposes, I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. HOWEVER, with that said, I purchased this item because it's something I would have purchased anyway, discount or no, and my review is composed 100% of my own thoughts and opinions. Thank you for reading, and I hope my observations help your decision.
summary: Toe the line and go! Adorable, quirky, fun socks for chilling around the house, probably yoga too!

reviewText: This suit is very cheeky. It fits fine, but I expected a little more coverage. I think I am just going to wear them under high waisted shorts. I really like the material. I got the black and it wasn't see through. Pretty satisfied considering the price.

It's not that the suit is large...there's an area in the small of my back that the material seems to collect in, it's not extremely visible, and because the cut is just what I was looking for, I didn't take away a star. I listened to the other reviewers who said to order a size up and I should have gotten my size. I'm 5'4 150lbs, 34B cup, 28in waist, 44 hips/butt and I thought about getting a medium because I am bottom heavy... but I ended up ordering a large. Either way, like I said... the high cut is super sexy.

One other pointer... one of the shoulder straps is just a slightly wider than the other. Hardly noticeable, but I sew as a hobby and can easily tell the difference. It's like they overshot the Serger and therefore the stitching is visible on the top side, the strings are hanging, and the strap curls up slightly.

All that being said, I felt super sexy wearing it, but not over sexualized... even though I'm bottom heavy. I got tons of compliments and I'm ecstatic with my purchase!

I could have fit a medium on the bottom half but a small on the top half.  Weirdly made. No support. I'd wear it with a bra as a top. Wouldn't swim in it.

This dress is really cute! The material is substantial and the dress is well-made. The front buttons up with pearl-shaped white plastic buttons, which was a nice touch. The cut is very flattering, and the arms were just right. I'm not a small person, and my upper arms are pretty big, but this dress's sleeves didn't squeeze my arms, nor were they baggy. There is a matching belt that loops around the waist to help it fit around your waist just the way you want it to. The material is a bit heavy for hot summer days, but this would be perfect for fall or even winter with a cardigan.

I'll probably end up having to give this dress to someone or see if I can get it altered because it is VERY long on me. I'm a little under 5'0", so that's why. I figured it would be long, but it ended up coming nearly to my ankles and with the type of dress this is, that just doesn't look good. If you're average height or taller, however, I wouldn't hesitate to get this dress. I'm not knocking off a star for that because I still feel the dress is very nice and very cute, and the length has nothing to do with something wrong with the dress -- I'm just super short.

reviewText: There isn't really much to this lingerie.  It's a mesh and lace combination with adjustable shoulder straps.  There is a nice,  thick band of lace that wraps around the body,  just below the bust.  I found that it was at my slimest point of my torso,  which made for a very flattering fit.  The bust consists of a very deep V cut with some sheer lace and mesh covering the breasts, but leaving very little to the imagination.  I am a large C and had no issues with being covered or fit.  There is absolutely no support in the bust,  but if you shorten the shoulder strap,  the lace will sit close to the body and give a little hold for some decent cleavage.  The 4 star rating is because of the slit running so far up in the front.  The bottom of this bodysuit is a see through mesh that seperates to fit around each leg, giving it an open crotch.  The slit for the open crotch extends up to the belly button (which is the weird part) and leaves the butt  exposed as well.  Think running shorts with an open crotch.  The legs are flowy,  but still very short.  I'm usually a 14/16 and wear XL tops and L bottoms.  I used their size guide and ordered the XXL and was pleased with the fit.  I would recommend getting 1 size larger than what you normally wear in shirts.  I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I bought this to wear in the hospital after my first baby and it was PERFECT- can't recommend this set enough and I plan to gift to every pregnant friend from now on. First, it is so so soft and comfortable which is all you will want after delivery. Second, some people told me not to bother because I would just wear a hospital gown the whole time but for me, once I started nursing, the gown was very irritating on my nipples so this tank was a godsend. Third, if you have hospital visitors you might want to feel "put together" and the robe over the pants is the perfect covered up look for guests. And fourth, it is black, so if you accidentally bleed through a bit, it's not ruined. I have been wearing these pajamas almost every night in the weeks since I've been home as well-they've held up well through frequent washing. After delivery you might feel like an alien in your own body a bit so treat yourself (or a pregnant friend!) to these beautiful pajamas!

reviewText:
I'm actually being generous to say that the fit was 'somewhat small', because seriously, they consider a 34" bust a "Large"?? (Nevermind that they have the sizes reversed, so that the 34 inch bust is listed as a "Small", and the 32.7 bust is listed as the Large (which I pointed out to them but they still haven't changed).  Anyways, in what world is a 34 inch bust *large*?)  But because I looked at the size measurements before ordering, I knew to order a medium;  if I'd ordered a small (which ordinarily would be the right size) it would definitely have been too small.

But that's not even the reason that this dress is getting a one star review.

To start, the zipper bunches up, rather than laying flat, and mind you this is on a woman with a very tall, slender frame (not me, my son's girlfriend - it should *not* have bunched up  - it isn't a matter of not having the length to lay flat, it's a matter of poor craftsmanship).

Then, the stripes aren't even lined up at all.  In the picture, now that I look closely, not all of them are lined up along the seam (although some are).  But in the dress I received, they aren't lined up anywhere, at all.

Finally, the material.  Note how *nowhere* does it say what this dress is made of.  Well, here's what it feels like:  a shower curtain.  It looks like soft, slinky material in the picture, but it is actually slippery, and does not feel good on the skin.

Overall, a very disappointing experience. :-(

In full disclosure, this company sent me this to review, however I am not bashful about giving my true opinion of a product (clearly).
summary: Too Small, Not Well-Made, Very Disappointing

I'm really torn on what star rating to give this. The top fits extremely well and was by far the most comfortable swimsuit I've reviewed this season. Most plus size swimsuits have built in cups that are way too big for me or the swimsuit is made for people shorter than me. This top actually fits my chest size and height perfectly. I'm 5'6 and a large B or small C cup. This top does have a small pad in it that is non-removable. You could easily cut a small slit in the back to remove the pad if you wish. The only thing I don't like about the top is that it floats up while swimming. I had to tuck it into my bottoms to get it to stay put. I would probably only wear this top for splash pads, waterparks, or water gun fights. I don't like swimming in it.

The swimsuit bottoms though they don't fit at all. I feel like they are two sizes smaller than the top. The tag in it says it's a size 58 just like the top but it's way too small. I ordered size Size: 4XL(US 18-20W) to get bottoms that fit I would need the 6XL. If I ordered the 6XL the top would be too large for me. I'm saving the bottoms for when I loose some more weight.

 SUMMARY: This is a well made comfortable swimsuit. The cup pads aren't removable but could be easily removed. I found the bottoms to be two sizes smaller than the top. This suit has straight stitching, no loose threads or seams. Quality wise, this is a very well made swimsuit.

reviewText:
I'm impressed with this suit. I substituted the brief style bottoms with a pair of navy spandex bike shorts that are longer and those worked perfectly for me. These brief bottoms fit better than another suit from the same seller that came with boy shorts. I tend to run larger in the bottom than the top so I'm not surprised.

The top has wider straps than most suits and that makes the suit much more comfortable. The straps are also adjustable with metal fittings. The skirted suit is very generous with the fabric and it drapes beautifully like a babydoll. The ruffling on the front is a bit more out there than the picture portrays, but it is nice to have decorative details added, that is rare for plus size suits. The open back adds some interest to the top without baring too much. The colors are bright and vivid, the fit is true. The construction is very good and this suit seems like it was really made with a larger woman in mind. It fits and flatters.

I'm about to go on vacation with my new suits & will post a picture of the suit in action when I get back.

Disclosure:  I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I did not guarantee a positive review and was not compensated for reviewing the product.

I wore this to dinner with a white blouse and got numerous comments on the beauty of my necklace.  The Necklace is on a gorgeous 18K Gold Plated necklace with a 2 inch extender that allows you to have the necklace to 20 inches if needed.  The aweinspring blue stone is in an  18K Gold Plated setting that is accented by 4 cubic zirconia stones, one at the top, bottom, and on each side.  The chain has an easy to open and close lobster claw.  The pendant also is made so it could be removed from the necklace and worn on something else if you so desired.  The necklace is not heavy at all.  It is quite comfortable and a stunning piece to add to any collection.  It would make a great birthday, anniversary, Christmas or any special occasion gift. DISCLAIMER: I received a significant discount on my order in exchange for a product review after a previous order failed to meet my expectations.

First and foremost: Listen to everyone who says this shirt fits small! Be prepared to order one size, if not two larger than your usual order. This shirt was made to Asian standards, which are much smaller than American. I have broad shoulders and a full bust - while I wear medium in standard shirts, most button-up shirts I have to order a large, but for this shirt I needed to order an XTRA Large.

Now with that being said, once you order the correct size, it really is a fantastic shirt. I like that the sleeves come halfway down the upper arm instead of cap up near the shoulder. With my wider shoulders, capped sleeves always made my arms look huge, but this shirt keeps things balanced.

The material seems well put together and the fabric isn't thin or sheer at all. If things change after the first 1 or 2 washes I will update my review but so far I am very pleased.
summary: Great shirt, but order 1 or 2 sizes up

This is my second lingerie set from Singlelady and I am again thoroughly impressed with the quality of the lingerie. I love lingerie but hate the price tag, especially considering that they usually don't last much past the 3rd wash or so. What impresses me so much about Singlelady's sets is quality of the material and how affordable they are compared to store prices. Even though the material is sheer, it isn't so paper thin that I have to worry that it will snag or tear with use. It actually feels like I could have this for a couple years and will last fine. The cut and design of this set is so sexy. I ordered mine in a powder/sky blue color and I think it helps soften the look. Its definitely risque, the breasts and crotch are uncovered and on display, if you know what I mean, but I think the softness of the blue changes it from "va va vixen" to "unexpectedly freaky girl next door".  I really like it and my  boyfriend seemed incredibly happy with it lol. I'll continue to order lingerie from Singlelady because so far, it's the first brand of lingerie I own that doesn't feel so overly delicate and they are super affordable.  I would (and have already) recommend them to friends and others as well.

I did receive my lingerie at a discounted promotional price for testing and evaluation purposes. I was not paid for my review and was asked only to provide whatever feedback I may have about the product, whether it be positive or negative. I welcome both positive or negative feedback as well. My review is solely based on my experience and honest opinions of this nightie.
summary: One of the better quality lingerie sets I've found. Fits as expected and feels like it will last longer than most

I purchased this Charm Beaded Bracelet in Crstal Blue Ice.  It came well packaged and quickly.  It wa packaged inside a little black jewelry box and inside of it was a jewelry bag for it.  Just perfect for gift giving.  I bought this for a friend who loves owls, and I must say this little bracelet did not disappoint.  The crystals are very pretty and sparkly and the owl charm is very cute and makes this bracelet quite unique.  The clasp works well and it is in new perfect condition.  I am very happy with this bracelet.  It is 7" and easy to put on and off with one hand.  It has 14 total charms on it.  I really liked the design of the mixture of colored blue beads and silver charms.  Great look!  I would say the color reminds me of December's birthstone.  Very bright pretty blue!  They call it Blue Ice.  I received a small discount when I ordered this bracelet.  [...].  Thank you!

I think this charm bracelet is absolutely adorable. The charms are shiny silver and the blue accent beads give it a pop of color.

I have another, much more expensive, name brand cheap bracelet in this style that I love as well. Unfortunately, because of the cost, it is a very slow process to add charms to the bracelet. It's nice to be able to purchase a bracelet that is already full of charms so there is no waiting to fill it up.

The bracelet has five silver charms, eight turquoise colored accent charms, and one dangle charm. There is also plenty of room to add a handful of additional charms if you would like. The bracelet is set up almost asymmetrically. There is one silver owl charm and one silver charm with a turquoise crystal dangle ball charm in the center. Working your waypoint from the those two center charms, the charms are identical in both sides. Starting in the center, you have a multi crystal blue charm, a silver charm, a blue faceted charm, a blue inlaid charm, another blue faceted charm, and finally a silver charm decorated with tiny flowers. The bonus owl charm is super cute, but the dangle ball charm is my absolute favorite. The charms are easy to remove and rearrange, but I like the balanced look of the way it came.

I had no trouble opening or closing the clasp. I simply slip my thumb nail into the slit on the clasp and it pops right open. The opposite end has a little nun in the end that lays in the open clasp and then the clasp snaps shut over it secure the lock. The clasp stays securely shut and I have had no problems with it popping open accidentally. It can be slightly tricky to put on by yourself, but no more so than any other bracelet. The bracelet is comfortable and fits perfectly - not so big that it slips off, but not too tight. None of the charms are scratchy or catch on the fine hairs in my arm or on my clothing.

The bracelet is not solid sterling silver like some of the more expensive name brands but it's a great option for someone who can't afford or doesn't want to spend a lot of money on a solid sterling bracelet. It's also perfect for a young girl who may not properly care for or possibly even lose a more expensive bracelet.

There is an identical pink option if that is  more your style. Both are equally pretty.

The bracelet comes packaged in a black velvet pouch and then inside a little black box. It is perfect for gift giving.

I have included two photos of the bracelet on my wrist. I took one photo with a flash and one without in an effort to catch the truest color of the bracelet.

I received this ice blue charm bracelet at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review of the product.
summary: Cute, affordable alternative to more expensive charm bracelets with the same look.

reviewText: 15 year old loves his watch.

I'm pleased with this purchase. There's a little bit of a learning curve to program it and the instructions won't tell you that the top and the bottom of the watch (with respect to the center part that tells time) are what's used used to adjust the numbers time and date. The watch tells time when you touch the surface but easily picks up smudges which is only a minor inconvenience. The red LED display is bright in total darkness and in direct sunlight you'll need to cup your hand over it for enough shade to see the numbers. There are no knobs or dials so all the programming is through the touchscreen display. You can also program the date and a short message (example "do great things") for inspiration or whatever you prefer. If you touch it to tell time, swipe upwards for the date, alarm, and 1 or 2 other features that I don't use. The time also has a 24 hour military format if you choose. I had to resize the watch but it was worth the hassle. Don't expect a $100 watch when you get this. I also wouldn't recommend swimming with this or using this in heavy rain. The surface picks up scratches if you're not careful and the coating that protects the metal will discolor over time. I think the watch is dollar for dollar one of the best I've recently purchased. I can't comment on long term performance but it seems to be going strong at the moment.

I love how the silver wraps around the stone; gently holding it without obstructing its beauty. The only flaw I found is that it does not lay flat against your chest when you wear it. It doesn't flip all the way over, but it does allow the back of the stone to be seen from the side depending on how you move. I realize the back of the stone can't be flat and still be faceted enough to sparkle like this necklace does. Whether it lays flat or not, I have received countless compliments each and every time I've worn it.

reviewText:
I had been looking for a handbag that would work with different summer (warm weather) outfits, because I was tired of constantly switching handbags to match what I wear.  Switching handbags generally adds another 5 to 10 minutes to my time, and then there is the hassle of going through the handbags that I hadnt yet emptied and put away. Therefore, between my daily and nightly uses I could have about half a dozen handbags to clean out by the end of the week.

When I shop for a handbag, it must meet my four personal requirements.

I definitely look for something unique, and not the same type that I see in the department stores, as they all start looking the same to me.

I want a handbag that will last and therefore, I choose a bag that has a good construction as well as a unique design.

Affordable is another requirement, as I am no longer willing to pay hundreds of dollars for a handbag. In addition, that includes the handbags with the fancy designers label name.

I purchased this handbag in the middle of July and this was my favorite handbag that I used throughout the last few months of summer and until the end of September.  I loved this handbag when I first received it, and now at the end of the season, I love it even more.

This handbag is custom-made for my personal style, it has the distinctive vintage appearance and it makes an eye-catching and bold statement. The synthetic leather exterior is as realistic as my real leather handbags, and the flawless workmanship offers impeccable attention to all of the design details.

I bought the white handbag with the three-dimensional flower that is subtly outlined in a darker color. An interesting feature is the dark perimeter that seems almost looks navy when I wear blue, charcoal when I wear grey, and black when I am wearing black. The handles, kiss type of closure and the rest of the hardware has a shiny gold-tone finish, with a subtle geometric design along the handles and the top perimeter frame.

The handbag offers two assorted methods of wear, an adjustable shoulder strap with a sliding brass buckle that attaches with large brass clips to the side brass rings. The large clips are easy to fasten and I don't chip my fingernails when I need to either attach or remove the shoulder strap.

There a one long zippered compartment along the back exterior of this bag and this easily fits my large Samsung Galaxy Note 3 cell phone, or my over-sized sunglasses that I always bring with me. I like this one long outside pocket in the back, as it keeps the things I need conveniently accessible without having to dig inside the bag.

The interior fabric lining is strong and durable, its washable, and it will NOT rip or tear easily. I like that this lining is stitched down securely, rather than loose and flowing because when a handbag has the extra loose material, I cant see where things are, and any extra and loose material makes it harder to take things out. The interior of this handbag features 6 spacious sections and compartments. There are two open sections stitched into the side lining that are reinforced and strong. If I choose to use the outside back compartment for my large sunglasses, then one of these compartments will accommodate my large Galaxy Note 3, standing upward and within its case. The other open side section is the same, only a bit smaller.

There are two large and deep zippered pockets on the other side, with another wide-open section. Any of these three areas are large enough to hold my blush compact, lipstick, eyeliner, mascara and more, everything that I might need to refresh my cosmetic appearance during the day. This also has enough room for my full-size brush and comb. In addition, any of these areas provides a place for anything that needs quick accessibility that would otherwise be lost down deep in the bag.

The last section is the largest one and this is spacious for a full size wallet, or even a paperback book, and on a rainy day, I can include a compact fold-up umbrella.

I love the size of handbag, its large but not ridiculously over-sized, and I love the big bold three-dimensional flower with all the details. The workmanship is as precise and as faultless as I would expect for any expensive designer handbag. As a fashion statement, this handbag would be the fashion focal point when wearing either a pattern or solid colors. The deep color along the perimeter of the flower petals seem to pick up and enhance different hues of blue or navy, black or charcoal grey, and whatever dark color Im wearing.

This is my all-time favorite warm weather handbag, and if/when, we go somewhere warm for our winter vacation I will bring this one with me. It makes a perfect transition from casual daytime to evening wear and it has an elegant, chic and stylish appearance that sets it apart from the ordinary.
summary: My Favorite Warm Weather Handbag  Excellent Design and Construction  Unique and Trendy Appearance - Goes with All My Outfits

reviewText:
Had to return it! I bought a Medium. I am 5'6", 220 pounds and, as will play heavily into my review, only an A/B cup.

The suit itself fit more or less perfectly (thought it was a bit snug pulling it up my legs which are by new means wide) but the cups were HUGE. If you're my size but blessed with a big bust (darn you) then this would be a great suit. It's got an adorable pin-up look and the material seemed of a good quality. But if you are like me, please note that my girls only took up about a third of the room. I don't know how big you'd have to be, but I'm guessing bigger than a C? The cups are very rigid, meaning that you'd probably have good support.

I bought one size larger than I typically wear, and I should have just ordered my size.  But thankfully it's still wearable, and somewhat adjustable with the tie back!  It fits really well.  I normally wear a C/D cup and I had room in the cups to fill more.  I like the colors.  The material doesn't feel like it will last me years, but it seems like it will last me through several of my upcoming trips as long as I treat it right!  My only worry is that the back might come untied at an inopportune moment, so I might stick a few stitches in there!  It was also approved by my kiddo.

Really cute laying on the bed!  However I have pretty loose jiggly boobs and tummy and the fabric didn't hold on to much of it.  The ties are made out of very stretchy fabric so it didn't hold the girls up much. I stitched a modesty panel into the v which helped me not look so saggy.

After reading the reviews (The suit runs small) I purchased an extra large, I probably could have worn a large just fine.  I am a dress size 10, with 36D bra size.  I have gained weight over the past few years, so bathing suit shopping has not been fun.  My tummy is no longer flat, and my thighs are no longer toned.  I wanted a suit that looked adorable, and didn't make me look pregnant.  I love the vintage look, and was thrilled to find this suit at such a great price.  This suit is very flattering for a fuller figured woman.  The molded padded cups cannot be changed, so if you are smaller chested be careful.  I appreciated the thicker cups, as they keep their shape, and look great.  I've worn this suit all summer.  The beach for 10 days straight, and many times in the pool.  The color looks just as good as the day I bought it, and the shape has stayed after many machine washes.  (I do not put my suits in the dryer.)  I am so pleased with this suit.  I felt confident all summer.  Buy it!
summary: Perfect for a full figured woman

It has a very retro pin-up look to it which I love because I'm definitely a pin-up girl. I dress in pin-up clothes 85% of the time and I love having a swimsuit that matches the rest of my style. The suit is blue with white polka dots and a cute little red bow and red halter straps that tie in the back. It's very comfortable to wear and surprisingly actually looks pretty good with my wider hips and curvier thighs. I wish I filled out the chest area a bit more, but it's not loose at all. As a matter of fact, I think if my breasts were any bigger, I may run into a problem getting it to fit properly. There is padding in the cups that hold your breasts in and keep them there, but also lifts them a tiny bit as well. I love this suit so much!

It's beautiful, a real show-stopper, but boy-howdy is it huge!  (Think shoplifter/ overnight/ airplane carry-on size).  The green floppy handles are best: pretty, and will even fit over my insanely fat arm even when it's stuffed into a puffy winter coat.

I was very pleased when I opened the well packaged handbag. It came with 2 protective dust bags and the long- strap to convert to cross-body.  The handbag seems to be very well made, inner pockets and a zippered divider pocket down the middle of the bag. It is very cute, a great price, and because it is vinyl, I don't care if it gets rained on this spring and summer.  I think it is so cute that I may buy one of the "bright" colors inthis style.
OMG!!!Just received today and taking out of box. Absolutely beautiful!!!!!

I ordered the black bag with the red rose and green braided handles.  It is a very pretty purse.
The colors are pretty true to the picture: the black is a matte shade; the green is a kind of forest green which complements the red and black very nicely.  I like the green handles which are easier to carry than the handles in the other choices/styles offered.  Also green handles make it a little more unique than black handles.  The size of the bag works for me, but it is larger than what is described.  At the top across its widest part, the bag is about 17, and the bottom is 12.5.  It measures 11 in height, and about 6  in depth.  This gives you ample space to fit all your stuff in.  There are metal feet which protect the bottom of the bag. There is an exterior zip pocket, and a zip closure on top.  Inside, there is a middle zip compartment.  On one interior back wall are two slip pockets; the other side has a zip pocket. These pockets make access and organization easy. As mentioned, there is a removable shoulder strap.  There are many details about the
bag that I really like.
Update:  I have been using this bag now for a few months, and it still looks like new.  It is very well made, and every part of it is holding up well. I have gotten many compliments about it.  It is apparently similar to a style made by Pijulski, a far more expensive brand.  This Realer bag may not be real leather, but frankly, who cares?  It looks and feels like leather, and most importantly, it is apparently durable. By the time it wears out, I'll probably want something else anyway.
summary: Nice looking bag with good organization

reviewText:
This is a very pretty, light-weight swimsuit cover up.  It is made of chiffon and lace and is quite transparent.  It is a pretty mint green color with a blue trim and there is lace around the neckline that travels down to almost where your belly button is.  The hem line is asymmetrical and it longer on the sides.

It covers you when wearing your swim suit but it still sexy.  You'll be able to see your swimsuit underneath because of the transparency.  I included a photo of it held up to my window so you can see....it's also really hard to see the color from the pictures.

We went out of town this past weekend and stayed in a hotel and I wore it down to the pool/jacuzzi.  It was the first time everyone saw it and like I said, I received many compliments. I received this product at a discount or free in exchange  for an honest and unbiased review.  My opinions are my own and are not influenced in any way by the discount given to review the product.  I purchase products often by using the Amazon review system and rely on the reviews to make educated decisions on my purchases.

A few months ago I tried out packing cubes for the first time.  I had never even thought about them before until I started seeing ads everywhere.  I must say they are such a great help when it comes to travel and I highly recommend them to EVERYONE who travels on even a semi-regular basis.

That being said there are many levels of quality of packing cubes.  So far I own two different sets.  This is the second set I purchased.  At first I was a little disappointed because straight out of the bag they look and felt a little 'cheaper' than my other set.  However, once I started to use them I realized that they had some benefits that more than made up for it.  My first set, though nicer looking and feeling, is flimsy once packed.  For example, if I was to pack it pull of underwear and swimsuits and take one out, the rest might fall out with it.  This one has more strength to the sides of it that keep it upright.  So if I only half it half full it will still have some of the boxy shape to it to hold the contents in place.  This benefit is far superior to the 'pretty' factor.

The color was a lot lighter than the picture, which I wasn't a huge fan of.. but as I mentioned, function over looks at this point.  I'm also not sure why someone really needed the three different laundry bags but no big deal.  I decided that I'm going to use the small one to put medicines in for an additional level or organization.  The other two I'll split for various different items.

One thing you may not realize until you run into it, is that when TSA picks your bag to go thru, they can leave you with quite a mess.  This way they can go thru your luggage and assuming they don't dump your zippered bags out, leave you with a somewhat organized bag still afterwards.

So overall:
Pros:  Sturdy, functional, hold quite a bit more than my other set even though they look as if they are smaller, GREAT help in packing/organizing.

Cons: Not as fancy looking as others, I wouldn't call it waterproof as only the sides would prevent water from getting it.  The top is mesh and if you spilled something wouldn't prevent it from getting on your items.

Although I did receive these items at a discount my review in order to review, the review is my honest experience with the product and will be updated based on long term use of the items.
summary: Much sturdier than other cubes I own!

reviewText:
Great 6 piece travel organizer! 3 packing cubes and 3 zippered pouches to keep things in order. When traveling by air, luggage gets tossed around so these packing cubes keep clothes from ending up a jumbled mess when I reach my destination. I also feel that using organizers helps make it easier to see if something has been stolen from my luggage since everything has its place.

A lot can fit in the 3 packing cubes and the mesh tops make it easy to see their contents without having to open them. Helps keep clothes from getting all mixed up and more wrinkled during travel. These organizers are lightweight so they're perfect for air travel when weight is an issue. I usually use a large suitcase that I have to check-in and it's not full upon my departure so without these organizers my stuff will be a mess upon reaching my destination. But my suitcase usually has more stuff on my way home from vacation so these containers keep thing in its own place.

These organizers make packing and unpacking easier. They can also be used at home to organize or store other things. I can also use some of these containers in my gym bag to keep things organized as well. Or to hold my emergency change of clothes that I always keep in the trunk of my car. I am pleased with this product.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Very useful and convenient. Keeps things in place.

reviewText: AlexStudio 6 Pcs Waterproof Packing cube organizer for Travel Compression product is actually great quality and right what you need if you want to pack all your staff in order in your suitcase. I chose blue color, zipper works perfectly and looks like decent quality. I like presence of three  small laundry pouches, that allows you to store dirty close in the same luggage bag without worrying. The only thing I can tell you this set is not enough even for one full size bag (62 linear inches, current lowest airline standard). You may need to two or may be three sets to fill one bag. I tested my luggage bag and I know I can fit 6 large size grid storage bags. This kit offers one large and two smaller size storage bags, which will probably be perfect for carry on luggage,  but too small for full size bag. In all this is a great set for travel, and I am very happy to own it. I got this set with discount for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: AlexStudio 6 Pcs Waterproof Packing cube organizer for Travel Compression is great set for travel with your carry-on luggage.

reviewText: These packing squares are very pretty, but the quality isn't fantastic.  The material is too thin to be totally waterproof, but they are water resistant. Basically, don't go swimming with these boxes if you don't want your stuff to get wet. The zippers feel flimsy, but I haven't broken any in my packing efforts so there's that.  It's a cute pack, but if you're looking for long-term durability you might want to keep looking.

Love love love! I am a huge fan of organization especially when traveling and even better when traveling with kids. You can separately pack your shirts in one shorts/pants in another ect. ect. Another great thing is the laundry bag so that those close stay out of reach of you clean items. these bags are light weight and don't really add anything when putting your luggage on the scale. I would recommend these to everyone and will be purchasing additional ones for our family trips

First, let me say that I travel A LOT, both internationally and domestically.  Packing cubes, in general, are true travel must-haves.  It is amazing how much more you can pack and how well-organized you will be.  They simply make your vacation or business travel MUCH better.

These Alex Studio bags are the Bomb!  First, there are a total of six bags in different sizes.  That is a lot of bags.  For my next trip I will be able to have a bag for each destination since there are four hotels in my journey.  They are well-constructed with the mesh sides (on the non-waterproof bags), which serves two purposes:  Customs people can examine your bag without a mess and At one glance you know what the cube holds.

There are my first cubes for my wet or dirty clothes and I am very pumped about these.  My travels keep me on the go sometimes changing cities or even countries daily.  I plan to use one for my bathing suits, one for my undergarments (which I will wash myself since my trip is 3 weeks).  The 3rd, which is quite large, will hold my laundry garments that I will have the hotels wash. If you travel at all never blow off hotel laundry - it will make your load lighter in your suitcase and I have never been disappointed.

Oh and the color is very pretty.  The cubes arrive in a storage bag which is pretty hand to keep them compacted and ready for the next trip.

I received this item at a discount for my personal evaluation.  As a long-time user of cubes, I can highly recommend AlexStudio - a great bang for your buck.

I like these packing cubes! I travel a lot and only recently decided to get packing cubes. These are decent and should help organize packing a a weeks worth of wisely selected wardrobe, depending on the climate.
I've been trying to pack smarter and make the most of my time travelling, so having these available for organization- especially when living out of a large backpack) is great. No more endlessly digging through for "that t-shirt" to leave everything in a jumble. You just need to pull out your designated pack and there you go. I also like the laundry bags for dirty clothes or personal items, but I think I'm still going to pack some extra plastic grocery bags as a back up.

The quality of these bags is decent- I had a stray thread which was keeping the largest cube stitched mostly closed, but snipped that and it was all good. The mesh and fabric seem sturdy and I hope they hold up. I have not tested the waterproof capabilities of the laundry pouch but the cubes are not waterproof as the lids are mesh. Zippers are pretty standard, nothing really stands out as good or bad. They all work easily. Finally, the fabric is a lighter blue than depicted in the photo, not too big of a deal but they're not as vibrant.

I am interested to see how these hold up to being in my back pack on my next trip and am looking forward to not having the contents of my bag wrinkled or thrown everywhere when I'm looking for my things!!

reviewText: great product

I was very hesitant in purchasing this self-adhesive bra and even more hesitant to wear it in public. But when I was invited to a gala and the dress I fell in love with couldn't be worn with a typical bra (strapless or otherwise), this self-adhesive bra saved the day.

I was so worried about it falling off and falling out of my dress, I did a trial run, wearing it under a t-shirt, and it worked a lot better than I expected.

It is a little smaller than I was expecting, but it wasn't much of an issue, it covered the most important parts. It also didn't provide as much lift as I would have liked either, but being on the smaller side, it still wasn't a huge issue.

Of course even after the trial run, on the night of the gala, I worried that I had used up all of the adhesiveness, but it stayed stuck all night.

I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

These types of bras are nice because you can pretty much wear them with anything and I like that there are no straps so that you can wear these with strapless dresses, halter tops, backless dresses, shirts with see through material in the back. It's very versatile and very useful for us girls to fit just about any outfit we would want to wear. The reason why I took off a star was because there's no instructions. I am lucky because I know how to use this bra and how to take care of it because I have another one that is similar to this that came with very detailed instructions on how to careful and how to apply this bra. If I did not have those instructions I would imagine that I would have had a hard time with this. Well, maybe not a hard time but I think that it would not be as effective and useful had I had instructions on how to use it properly. Yes, it is a very simple product. It's a bra and most of us ladies that are old enough to use this all have common knowledge on how to use a bra but even just a quick set of instructions would be nice. But besides that this bra is very useful. Again, it's very versatile and I think that it's a must have just for those few articles of clothing that you'd rather not show your bra straps in. It's not as comfortable as a regular bra would be but than again the only bras I find comfortable are sports bra so some women might find this very comfortable. The reason why I find it slightly uncomfortable is because of the adhesive that's on the bra that keeps the bra on your boobs. I have sensitive skin so when I have it on for long periods of time it tends to be uncomfortable for me. But for most people I think that's not an issue. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

How well this fits or works depends a lot on your boobs and the look you are going for. The cups run pretty true to size, but I think to get that cleavage look, you have to pull everything towards the center than stick it on. If you just want coverage than buy your size. If you're a little saggy and want to push them up and together, maybe either a size down (depending on how big you are) or stick them on closer to your arm pit then pull them together and snap closed in the center.
  I'm pretty happy with it tho. I bought them from an Amazon review affiliate and got a discount, but honestly, they aren't too expensive anyway.
  They are comfortable to wear and they are not painful to remove like some ice used. They are lightly padded and come on a cure clear plastic zippered storage bag and replaceable plastic sheets to cover the adhesive when not in use.
  I'd recommend ordering your true size, but if you are between sizes, I'd say go down. They aren't too "cup" shaped so that they look silly on - like a boob on top of a boob. I tried my best to explain it... lol.. Hope this helps - if so, Lmk below!!
summary: Pretty true to size- Pain-free removal
