reviewText: This is a sturdy and well-made bag that has a lot of space inside to hold most everything youll need for personal hygiene. The canvas is thick and strong but nice and smooth too. Its lined to help keep any possible leaks contained, and the zippers are durable and easy to zip and unzip. In my video I was able to unzip them with just my left hand while using my right to hold my phone. Also in my video you can see how much stuff easily fits inside this Yuedge bag without even packing it totally full. Its not large enough to hold my big can of hairspray or my big hairbrush, but it can hold most everything else imaginable that I will need to shower, shave, etc. Well, it might be big enough for the hairbrush and hairspray, but there wouldnt be much room left (mine are really big lol). I got this bag mainly for my husband to have available whenever his current toiletries travel bag wears out. He travels a lot and his luggage gets worn out and has to be replaced every so often. Also it will work well for most of my bathroom necessities and I can toss my hairbrush and hairspray into my duffle bag or something, for just an overnight trip when I want to pack light. Honestly I wasn't sure this bag would be very good quality when I ordered it, but I was glad to see when it came that it really is high quality and seems to be made to last a long time. Really the only reasons I didn't give it 5 stars is because I think it could use another pocket inside to help organize things a little better. (The outer pocket is very tight and doesnt hold much.) And theres an odd brand name on it that I have no idea where it came from because its not the seller I guess. This YUEDGE Toiletry Bag was provided with discount for me to test and review based on my personal experience and opinion.
summary: This bag actually is better than I expected!

reviewText: Great sturdy compact toiletry travel bag that you can easily access and fill. I love that this bag has double accessibility with the panoramic zippers ;it opens from the top with 2 horseshoe shaped zippers. There is a smaller outside zipped pocket where you can store your toothbrush, toothpaste or razors and a 1 inch handle at the end of the bag for convenient portability. Once opened, you can store about ten 3-ounce travel sized bottles and still have some room for deodorant and toothpaste. The inside also has a little zip up area which is great for dental floss, picks, tweezers, nail clippers and personal scissors or small items that need to be stored alone. Another great component is the strong tabbed hanger at the "lid" of this toiletry case which can make this hang on a hook, tent pole or hanger. As for quality, I love the qualityI am hoping that the tabbed hanger will hold up in time when filled. Great sizenot too big and not too small but the shape is perfect to carry and access. It is water resistant on the outside and wipes off very easily. The double zippers are good quality and the blue is a deep navy blue. My 4 star review is due to the interior of my bag which does not resemble the interior picture on Amazonit appears that the bag's pictures on this site have 3 or 4 allocated pockets where you can stand some colognes or bottlesmy bag just had 1 outside zippered pocket and 1 inside lid meshed breathable zippered pockettheir listing is accurate but their interior picture is misleading. reviewText:
This toiletry bag is awesome-- super simple, small, yet spacious enough for plenty of necessities. I travel a lot and being able to keep all my stuff together is really convenient. I was able to fit my shampoo, conditioner, shaving cream, razor, soap, toothpaste and toothbrush without a problem. The bag has two convenient features: 1. A handle on the side of the bag (super helpful if you stuff into a bag); and 2. A hook to hang in the bathroom while in use. I added a photo of my shampoo in the bag for scale. Love this bag! Highly recommended.

*I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest review.

Working as a firefighter, I spend a lot of time away from home.  In fact, the fire station is my second home.  One item that is essential for every firefighter is a good quality toiletry bag, and the Yuedge delivers.  At first appearance the bag seems small, however, the exterior compartment is large enough for my toothbrush, toothpaste, floss, etc. while the interior mesh compartment allows storage for my shaving gear.  That leaves plenty of room in the main compartment for shampoo, soap, hairspray, etc.  The exterior material of the bag is durable with quality interior stitching that has held up very well.  The interior hook is great for my over the door hanger in the bathroom and my locker hook as well.  The exterior zipper has the extra fabric pull tag, which ensures quick and efficient closing without having to use much effort.  This bag is perfect, not too big, and strong enough to take on any firefighter I know.  This product was supplied to me for Free/discounted price by the vendor to utilize and assess it for their clients. My evaluation is honest and true and is in no way impacted by the seller. If the product is not as described or is flawed I hold the right to post a negative review.
summary: One item that is essential for every firefighter is a good quality toiletry bag

reviewText: Good quality, durable and very spacious.

This bag is awesome. It is the perfect size for me.  I'm using this as a makeup bag.  I previously had two medium sized bags that I would take with me. It is so nice to now be able to keep everything in one bag.

There are several things that I love about this bag. The material used feels very durable and quite rugged - it can stand up to extensive travel and use. I like that it has a handle on the side -- it makes it easy to grab and go.  This bag is really perfect for my travel makeup The main compartment is very large and holds quite a bit.  I keep all of the eyeshadows, blushes, bronzers, foundations,concealers, powders and lipsticks in this compartment.  There is a mesh zippered compartment at the top of the zippered lid - once you unzip and open the main compartment, the flap has the zippered mesh area.  In this section I keep my makeup brushes and sponges.  There is a front zippered section that  is in the front of the bag and is the full length of the bag -- this is where I keep my eyeliners and mascara.

This is the perfect bag for me and I really like it. Based on the size and compartments, it would make a great toiletry bag too.

I would highly recommend this bag. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review. Like you, I use reviews to make purchases through Amazon so I've provided a review that is truthful and completely honest as if I paid full price for the product.

I've ordered two of these at different times, white and red, and they fit very well.  The ones I got are comfortable. I was about to order another one, but noticed something.  Both of the colors I bought previously have had a size chart among the pictures and showed the "free return" statement (which I didn't need to use).  Read Carefully; some colors do not have the free return and do not carry the "free shipping over $$" but just "free shipping". Some also do not show the size chart in the pictures.  I think this might be the problem some people have had with fit and return shipping charges.  I expected that all of the colors on the same page would actually be the same except for color, but that apparently is not the case. But, I do like the shirts and will probably order more.

reviewText: Looks so good but fits too small.

For what ever reason, the sizes for this set starts at medium and goes up from there.  Im typically a size 4-6 so the medium was perfect. I would equate that to a small. I was a bit skeptical of how this lingerie would really feel.  To my surprise, the description of this lingerie dress is true! The lace that covers the breast area is soft, even at the seams.  I couldn't get over how it felt on my skin.  I was not impressed with the quality of the ribbon that was used.  As part of the dress, it seems soft enough, but the section of ribbon that you would tie a bow in the middle of the dress was a bit stiff.  I wouldve preferred a more satin type of ribbon for that part.  The mesh (?) for the remainder of the dress was fine and it is pleated at the chest as pictured.  The straps for the dress will do, but they have these little loops on the edge of the elastic that Im almost certain will get caught on something like your ring. The G-string that is included is made of the same material as the dress itself so it too is soft.  The seat of the G-string runs right down the middle of the panty, which visually is annoying.  I like to have an extra cotton layer where your lady parts would be.  But, because the mesh/lace is soft, it doesnt seem to be a problem in terms of comfort. Overall, I like it.  I would heed the directions to hand wash though. I don't think it would take a tumble in the wash too well.  Pictures included with the dress over a camisole.

I received this item at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased opinion.
summary: Im typically a size 4-6 so the medium was perfect. I would equate that to a small

reviewText:
I ordered the Korotus Faja Waist Trainer Corset Latex Workout Cincher Body shaper 2XL

I recently learned about waist training and after having four kids I'm up trying anything to feel like my tummy is tighter and smaller...or help it move in that direction.

I ordered a 2xl (I'm a 10/12). It fit pretty snug at the bottom but the top had a gaping area. I think with more wear I could fit into a smaller size but the lower belly bulge is where I need to focus right now. After a little wear I was able to move the tighter row of clasps.

This waist trainer was so comfortable that I wore it all day (cleaning house, running errands, etc) for hours and it didn't bother me at all. The fabric was really soft. I don't think it's completely "invisible" as mentioned but it's hidden enough that I've worn it under a dress and top and felt it wasn't showing terribly.

I am still getting used to waist training but one thing I love is that it helps with posture when I'm wearing it...like a reminder to sit or stand up straight.

I really noticed a difference when I took off the Waist Trainer after wearing it all day the first time. My tummy was flat and actually felt tighter. I'm looking forward to keeping at this practice for a longer period of time to see just what kind of results can come of this.

The fabric/style appear to be well made. The boning is well protected and not bothersome in any way. My only complaint is I wish I would have ordered the 1xl instead of the 2xl because of the gaping at the top. I highly recommend you measure your waist before you order and follow the guidelines.

The clasps are a pain to do/undo but it's much better than a velcro version and you know it's going to hold you in tight as long as you're wearing it.

Disclaimer: I did receive this product to try for free in exchange for an unbiased review. I value how helpful these reviews are when shopping and I would only share my exact feelings about a product in this space.

If you found this review helpful would you click the button saying so?
summary: Amazing Results After Wearing One Time

This is an interesting shirt that I'm hesitant to speak highly of yet... I haven't had an opportunity to wear it out for an evening. (I know that some shirts just don't "wear" well and I can't speak to that yet)

I will say the fit is what I like. It's Slim Fit and for me, it's perfect. It's not too tight and feels comfortable. I will say it's just a "touch" longer than I like for an untucked shirt. (Maybe 3/4" too long) So this might be a tucked shirt only for that reason.

The material is interesting. It's SUPER soft and has a bit of a shiny sheen to it. Not over kill but noticeable. I don't hate that or love it. It's ok.

The style of this particular color combo (Light blue with dark blue accents) is nice for a subtle look without lots of flair. My wife likes the dark color under the cuffs and the little "pocket square triangle" for lack of a better description.

I see this as a nice casual dress shirt that I will wear when I need a bit more flair than a solid button up but not overly "Look at me" for the night out on the town.

I did receive this product at a reduced price in return for my honest review. I hope you find it helpful!

This review is super late, but I will do my best to be as accurate as possible.
Before I begin though, I don't comment much on the delivery process, ie, how effective/professional the carriers are. That should not influence my review of an item.
Firstly, let me start out by taking a look a the material. The tag that it comes with indicates that it is 75% cotton, 22% Polyester and 3% Spandex. Now, I honestly was expecting a more premium feel where the material is concerned. The shirt feels way too thin. I was expecting something thicker which would indicate that it is better quality. Also, the fact that it does have some amount of spandex, I was expecting it to be even a bit stretchy. I did not notice that either. The color of the material does match the image perfectly and the designs are all in the right places. [I will just have to leave some space here for when I wash it, to see if I lose any color] Overall though, I would give the material a 7/10.
Secondly, Design and Fit. I won't speak much on the design, everything is where it should be according to the images on the website, so the design is spot on. I ordered an XL because that's what I normally wear. I was however tempted to buy a larger size, out of fear that I t would be a bit too small but It actually fits perfectly. Just the right amount of room in the sleeves. Not too loose and not too tight either. It gracefully and subtly hugs my muscles. So for everyone who's thinking about purchasing this shirt, you can buy your actual size and it will fit. So overall, Design and Fit would get a 10/10 *applause*

H2H Mens Casual Slim Fit Oxford Button Down Lightweight Shirt With Chest Pocket

I saw this shirt and it looked really cool! So I decided to order me and check it out.  I have been in the retail business and mens formalwear undustry for about 8 years now and I know exactly what my size is.  I typically wear a size 16 shirt 34-35 sleeve and make sure its fitted.  So when I ordered this shirt I figured that a large would be enough to fit.  In tshirt I am usually a size medium and very rarely a size large.  So when I ordered this I figured that a extra large would fit me perfectly.

Once it arrived it looked like it was going to fit perfectly but upon trying it on the back was still a little tight and the chest if buttoned would pucker up and open up on the front!  I had previously ordered a shirt from a different company but with similar  speck and that shirt fit me extremely tight so I decided to give this one a go.  Partially I can say that its probably my fault for my build.  But I will not deduct more than one star for it still being way too slim fit.

The cool/weird part of the shirt is the material of the shirt! Its not you typical 100% cotton wrinkle free dress shirt!  This shirt is soft and silky kind of like sheets or polyester shirts.  That didn't bother me too much but gave it a Miami vice aka camp shirt feel to it.

Overall it is a good shirt but I will definitely not button all the buttons up due to fit issues.

Although they sent me the wrong color I am still happy with this shirt. I ordered the light blue shirt and was sent the dark blue shirt. It feels nice to the touch and is very comfortable when worn. The shirt is a slim fit and I love how it fits on me. As a tall and skinny person it can be hard to find properly fitting shirts that don't have an absurd amount of material hanging off of it. The sleeves are nice and can be worn like in the pictures provided by the seller with ease. They are kind of tight so they can rest above your elbow easily, which was very nice. The shirt wasn't too hot when worn outside with jeans on either. While wearing it, I noticed that while it fits nicely, some of my movements are restricted, which is sort of expected with this cut of shirt.

The buttons were a little annoying though. Every time I undid a button it would be snagged on a piece of thread that I would have to cut in order to undo the button. This happened 4 or 5 times, and I don't want to have to cut up a new shirt when I get it.

When I got the shirt, I would say it smelled a little like Halloween costumes if that makes any sense to you or is of any value to you haha. Also, if you were wondering, the front pocket is real and isn't just for aesthetics.

I would recommend this shirt to anyone who needs a more formal looking shirt, and Ill likely wear it when going out, or perhaps even at more formal events.

reviewText:
I should have taken the other reviews I read for this shirt to heart about being sized a bit small. It IS a slim fit shirt, afterall. But unfortunately for me, I fall into a strange body type somewhere between large and extra large. Some brands fit me at large, other times I need an extra. I chose to go with an extra large with this shirt, but I should have heeded the advice from other reviewers and ordered a size larger. It isn't that the shirt doesn't fit at all. I can wear it and it does look great, but it is tight and I have a feeling after a wash or two it will be so tight the buttons will be popping. Slim fit shirts might be great for ripped guys but if you have a bit of a dad bod - a thin build with a beer belly - you really need a larger size, and that's what I should have gone with.

But I cannot fault the shirt or then company for my mistake. Like I said, the shirt looks great. My girlfriend picked it out for me and encouraged me to purchase it and she loves it on me. The shirt is well made with good material and is very stylish. Definitely a nice dress shirt and I would recommend it to anyone looking for one; I would just also recommend buying a size up!

This shirt is very well made, stylish and the material is so soft. It does run a bit small, so make sure you order a size up.

reviewText: I am extremely pleased with this dress!  It arrived quickly and in great shape along with bonus jewelry from the seller! I got a beautiful wedding dress for half the price of my fiance's tux rental!  Looking forward to looking like a princess at my wedding next month.

I'm surprised and appreciative of the quality of this dress and the attentiveness of the seller.  I've tried on several dozen different dresses and this is by far the best one.  Some of the ones that I tried were double and even triple the price of this dress and this one is still my favorite. It's soft and made really well. Quality fabric and sewn well. The seller even added some accent jewelry which was a total surprise and really pulled the dress together.  Ordering online I was afraid that the fabric was going to feel really cheap, and it did on some of the other dresses I tried. But this dress is beautifully made and I feel elegant in it.  It is the one that I've chosen to get married in.

I'm 5 foot 7 inches and weigh 110 pounds. I have no curves whatsoever, 32A bra size, long torso. This swimsuit size large fit really weird and too big. Reviews said to go a size larger or two but the only thing that did was make it BARELY long enough to go from my crotch to my shoulders while still covering my chest. It was super snug from the crotch to the top of the shoulders and then ok around my chest but had this weird saggy material on the back area. The model pictures on Amazon are a total misrepresentation of the fit. I'm bummed because it is such a cute design!

SO...If you have a womanly hour glass figure (treasure in your chest and junk in the trunk) with a short torso, you will probably fit this suit. Since I have neither and I am built like someone's little brother, this womanly swimsuit simply looked ridiculous on me.

I'm. In. Love.  Seriously this romper is so cute.  I wore it out to a jazz festival last night and it was so comfortable.  I have a long-ish torso and it fit me just right.  I'm 5'4" and about 123 lbs and the small fit perfectly.  The romper isn't too long in the legs which is something I usually worry about with rompers since my legs are on the shorter side.  I love the off-the-shoulder look and the neckline is perfectly placed.

The only thing I wasn't thrilled about with this is the waistline.  It's kind of awkward and doesn't look super flattering unless you wear a belt, but I feel like that's pretty standard with most rompers.  I wore this with a thick belt and it fixed the awkwardness just beautifully

These are my second pair of UA Highlights. Overall, they are great cleats. They provide superior ankle support and are SO LIGHT.

HOWEVER. These are murderous to break in. As I said, this is my second pair. I have two other friends who have purchased these as well. They are super rough to break in. They have a pad on the inside back of the heel that can simply remove your heel skin if you're not careful. WEAR PROPER SYNTHETIC SOCKS and consider wrapping your feet in tape the first few times to avoid horrible blisters.

Over time, they will break in and your feet will develop calluses.
summary: Great cleats, very hard to break in

reviewText: This is a beautiful and fun lingerie set to have as it is perfect for a special occasion with your partner. I particularly decided to get the white one as it is ideal as a bridal gift as it reminds me of my hot wedding night. I like to roleplay and and relive those moments and so I loved this lacy white one as it looked just as described. In terms of measurements, it fit as as expected as I ordered the medium and it fit me great in every place. If its any help, I currently weigh 123 lbs and my height is 5'2ft. I have a 36 C cup and the medium size was quite accurate for my measurements. The bottom part was perfect while the top part was great as I managed to use the middle part to adjust my breast between it. As a curvy woman, this is a indeed a hit! The top part is ideal for us who have a medium to larger chest size. It is also very comfortable to wear and of durable high quality lacy materials. My only suggestion would be to wear it carefully as you can't just slip it on. Its adjustable but you have to take you're time while wearing it but otherwise its a great fit as mentioned before. It is also soft and gentle as the lacy material is quite smooth. Overall, I truly like it a lot and I am glad that I purchased it at a discount in exchange for my honest and fair review as it a charm to wear. I would easily purchase another one in a different color next time as it is that great in style and quality. Ideal for both me and my partner as he loved it as well as it compliments my curves.

I am confused about how this is considered crotchless since it doesn't give open access to that area. At least the way it fits me the panties part covers the front and bottom area completely, just not the back. Otherwise I like it. It is similar to how I expected it to be and it fits as expected, although the underwire does make it a need to be adjusted just right to fit right at the chest. I got a good response about the openness of that area though. I did receive this lace lingerie at a discount in exchange for an honest, unpaid review and will update if my experience with it changes over time.
summary: I am confused about how this is considered crotchless

reviewText:
Bluecosto Portable Waterproof Nylon Travel Shoe Bags with Zipper Closure - Pack of 2, Blue

If you're a traveler you already know that when you pack extra shoes for your trip it's nice to be able to separate them from your clothing. After all, shoes get dirty. These Bluecosto show bags are what you need. The enclose your shoes keeping any grime away from your clothes. They're made of nylon and have a full length zipper to close them up. They feel durable and rugged. My size 11 Merrell Mocs fit fairly well but I'm wondering if they were bigger if they would fit. I don't think high heeled should would be a good fit but maybe a smaller size will cross fit in the bag. The bag is fairly large so I'd say most shoes will probably fit. Overall these are very handy to have in your luggage and will be greatly appreciated if your extra shoes are dirty.  They compare a slight odor but I'm sure that will dissipate with time. I didn't find it offensive, just an observation.

This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.
summary: These should work well for all but the largest shoes

reviewText:
(Bill, Husband Reviewing) I got these for my wife because they matched one of her watches and they looked really neat to me. She liked it and wore it the next day to work so I felt good about it. The only reason that it is not getting 5 stars is because when I got it out of the wrapper and was looking at it the stone fell out of the setting and it took me a while to figure out how to get it back in and secure it without ruining the shape and look of the setting.  The ear rings match up perfectly and are the length that she likes. Everything fits perfectly now that the little adjustment was made.
I received this product at a reduced price in order to do an unbiased and honest evaluation which this is. I make these as honest as I can base on my experience because I know how much I depend on the reviews when I am looking at different products. If my review is helpful for you in any way, please click the [YES] button below. Good Shopping and Thanks for reading. This set is absolutely beautiful! the stones are such a deep red they almost look like drops of  blood, and when the light hits them, the deep red color sparkles so well, its really amazing. I love this set. It looks great with the little black dress, anything white, and of course red, but you really should wear them with something contrasting, to showcase them. You will get so many compliments on them you will be happy you bought them. They would be great for a gift too. I myself love the elegant and graceful design of them and the gold color really pops with the red stones. the chain is a sturdy one, not cheap looking and not likely to break easily.
summary: BEAUTIFUL--it can come in a package!

reviewText:
I was pleasantly surprised by this set and have received several compliments each time I wear them. The necklace hangs at the perfect length and the chain is beautiful and sturdy. Not a thin piece of metal that will break easily.

The stone in each piece is beautifully cut and catches the eye.

My only two criticisms (and they aren't significant) are that the earrings have some weight to them. Not terrible, but enough for me to take them out as soon as I get home.

The only other issue is that the gem is smaller than the gunmetal backing that sits between the gold and the gem. This takes away from some of the beauty if the necklace ever gets flipped around.

Overall though I am very happy with the purchase.

I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest review.

We haven't worn it to the beach yet because I ordered a matching one for myself to wear with her and I want to wait until that arrives. I'm going to assume that because the material for the bottoms is metallic, it will fade and get roughed up fairly quickly (that has happened with some of my daughters shirt from Carters that have metallic on them) but I haven't noticed that yet. My daughter actually is on the smaller side, and is 18 months. I ordered the 2-3 size and it fits her perfectly, although the top is a little big. The design on the bottoms is so stinking cute. The bow on the top has perfect placement and is sewed on very well. I seriously can't get over how cute this bathing suit is. It makes me want to order it for my daughter in every size. I am disappointed in this shirt. In the past, I have bought many shirts from Fiream for my grandson. Every time I have been very pleased with the quality and overall shirts. Unfortunately, this shirt I am not so thrilled.  I gave it 3 stars for the following reasons. I dislike the color scheme on it. I was hesitant about the colors when I was contemplating buying it. It looked like it had pink on it, but I was not sure.  I do not like dressing my grandson in  pink or purple. However, if there was any pink, it looked like it was just a tiny splash. Wrong! It is not just the pink, it is the entire color scheme. It is hard to tell from the pictures. But the shirt has lots of pink, teal. As far as the construction of the shirt, it appears to be made well. All of the stitching is even, no loose strings, etc. The material is a little thick, but it feels cheap. I think because of the graphic design. I read one review that stated it faded immediately after it was washed. Looking at this shirt, I was concerned it would fade as well. I have had custom shirts made for my grandson before that had graphic designs. One store owner said do NOT wash shirts with graphic designs with any type of baby detergent. That baby detergents contain a lot of stain removers and can cause fading. So I washed this shirt in the sink with regular detergent and hung it to dry. Another reason I am not happy with this shirt. Who has time to hand wash a baby's or child's play shirt? (Except a grandparent, like me). It is just not practical. Lastly, the biggest problem I have with this shirt is the only care label I found was written in Chinese. Which is great for people living in China. But I live in America. I do NOT know how to read Chinese! I purchased this shirt at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest, unbiased review. Which I think you can tell is unbiased. I would have given the shirt 2 stars and returned it if I had to pay full price. As I stated at the beginning of this review, until now, I have been extremely pleased with my purchases from Fiream. This particular shirt does not meet my standards.

This shirt is made from a very nice quality 100% cotton fabric and is stitched well. The style and cut of this shirt fits the same way any of my toddler's other shirts do but it's exactly one size smaller. I'm glad I decided to size up when I ordered. He wears an 18 month but I ordered a 24 month because it was made of 100% cotton and I expected shrinkage. All of the seams look sturdy and after two washes the thread all remains where it should. I'm very happy with the quality of the fabric and the adorable print.

Of course, the tails is NOT safe for swimming. The top is smaller in person that I thought it would be. It's basically two shells and three ties for the back. The three ties make this top fairly secure considering the way it's designed. This is definitely more costume than swimsuit, but it is really cute and my daughter liked it a lot.
This is definitely a novelty swimsuit and I do not expect that it will last an entire summer if you are someone who spends a lot of time at the beach or pool, but you can guarantee that your little mermaid will be the cutest one at the pool while it lasts!

reviewText:
I was asked to review this product at a free or discounted price in exchange for an unbiased review of this dress.

I really like the material and the durability of the clothing. However, it fits super small even after ordered a size up! But I fixed the problem by turning it into a sexy shirt instead of a dress, which works great for me.

I'm not sure what all these other reviews are about the material being heavy. This dress is completely see through. It does feel kind of loose, but I probably won't ever be able to wear it because I have nothing I can wear under it to avoid exposing myself. The material is somewhat thick which surprised me when I put it on because you could clearly see my underclothes. It is quite comfy but after wearing it for about 10 minutes around the house, I felt hotter than normal, so it doesn't seem like that material is that breathable. I'll probably go buy a slip and wear it for 1 night in Vegas, but I guess that might give me my moneys worth. For the material, I don't think that price is worth it, but if you already have a slip it might be for you. The cut is very appealing, and it's not too tight on, but it is super short so walking around you will be that person pulling your dress down.

I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: simple and sexy, but see through

reviewText: All white dresses are timeless and ooze class and sexiness when cut right. This dress is perfect in all aspects as it expertly blends class with that touch of sexiness all women want in a mini dress. This dress is a simple long sleeve V cut mini dress . What makes this dress unique is that it doesn't hug the body at every turn, but is cut very slim. A slim cut dress as opposed to a body con means that the dress feels very comfortable when moving in it; one of the most comfortable dresses I own. Furthermore, this dress is made of high class material, which is evident at first sight. The top is padded in the breast area, which adds lots of support and eliminates the need for a bra as the material is not see-through. The shoulders are also padded to give the dress a bit of structure and classiness. The dress is short and I must admit will ride up when walking. This is where choosing the correct size is very important. I am 5'7" 125 pounds and where a size 2. The medium fit me very well. The only other size available for purchase is X-large and I think a woman that is normally a 6-10 would fit comfortably in the X-large. If you are larger than a size 10 I am not sure this dress will fit you properly, but I am not sure. Overall Excellent purchase!

I like this wallet. It is very slim and easy to carry, it slips in your pocket and you forget that it is even there. At the same time it still has enough storage options to carry most anything you would need unless you are just one of those people who crams everything in their wallet and use it as long term storage.

The design is perfect for me.  I carry my work ID in the windowed slot for easy identification, along with my drivers license in the second slot. The opposite side carries payment options (debit and credit card). Behind the card sets I keep a blank check on one side and my health insurance card on the other. That leaves the main center pocket for cash and that's all I need.

My only complaint with this item would be the leather. It is not the highest quality leather and the color just looks bad in my opinion. To be fair, the color is exactly how it appears in the photos, it is just too orange/red looking for me and I think it makes it look cheap. But, I will still be using it as my daily carry. Function over form.

The RFID shield is a great addition but not why I purchased this. Honestly, it's not something I am concerned with so I just view it as a bonus. I have no way to test it's functionality though, so I can only trust that it works as advertised.

I have not had this product for very long so I am not able to speak to the durability of it in terms of longevity. It seems well constructed as far as I can tell. However, if I have any problems with that in the future, I will be sure to post an update to this review with any relevant photographs.

This is a good product and I would recommend it.
If you considered this review helpful, please mark it as such below so that other people will be able to find it more easily.

I did receive it a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review, but that in no way sways my review. If a product is bad, then I will tell you; and if my opinion changes with more use I will edit my review. I know how much I depend on these reviews when I am purchasing products for myself, and I work hard to give accurate and helpful advice anytime I review a product. I say all that because I have to in accordance with the Federal Trade Commission 16 CFR Part 255: Guides Concerning the Use of Endorsement and Testimonials in Advertising, not because it sways my review in any way.

I hope you enjoy this product should you decide to get it. Thanks for reading and happy shopping!

reviewText:
received this product at a discount in exchange for my fair and honest review. I am in no way affiliated with either the manufacturer or the seller of this product. I always rely on user reviews when making purchases, whether online or in a store. This super slim card/ID wallet comes in an attractive, sturdy gift box and is a lovely chestnut brown color. It has six card pockets including the ID window for your driver's license.
Love this ultra slim wallet! Great for when you are on the go and don't want to carry a purse. Love the ID window on one side for easy access to my ID card. Plenty of space for lots of cards. I also really love the color of the leather.

Genuine Leather Go Wallet, Ultra Slim Card/ID Holder, RFID SAFE with Gift Box This super slim card/ID wallet comes in an attractive, sturdy gift box and is a lovely chestnut brown color. It has six card pockets including the ID window for your driver's license. It also has a slightly larger compartment for storing tickets, receipts, bills etc. The stitching is nice and even and well finished, no loose threads anywhere. It looks and smells like quality leather and seems as if it will last a long while. The wallet is RFID blocking which means your cards cannot be scanned while in the wallet. This wallet is suitable for men or women for when you just want to carry the essentials in your front pocket. I really like this little wallet. It will come in handy for hiking, biking, essentially anytime I don't want to be bothered with carrying a purse. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my fair and honest review. I am in no way affiliated with either the manufacturer or the seller of this product. I always rely on user reviews when making purchases, whether online or in a store. I appreciate the time and effort it took to write the many comprehensive and detailed reviews that I have read over the years. I hope that my review has been helpful to you. If you have any questions or comments, please put them in the comments section below. Thank you.

reviewText:
This is a very nice jumpsuit. I love it. The material is very light, silky and so comfortable. It is not at all sheer, yet you can feel the breeze through the fabric on your skin. It is perfect for very warm weather. I wore it to an afternoon birthday party last week and received so many compliments. Compared to others that I have tried, this is a find.

The only issue is be careful with the sizing. Small is a UK 8-10. They tell you this, which is why I can't complain about it. I am 53 and 118lbs and wear a size US 4. But small is the smallest they have. The length of the small with a little heel is perfect. It has a belt which takes care of any oversize in that area without any indication of it being oversized.  It is not skin tight, which I am happy about but not at all baggy either. The top was a little big and I put a few stitches under the arms and it is perfect. I was willing to alter a bit, it took 10 minutes to do, rather than return due to the very reasonable price and that I loved it compared to others I had tried.

Also, it says black and white Aztec. I thought the white would be white but it is a beautiful light cream color.
They fit true to size and are really cute!
Very pretty but fits small

This is a very cute yet comfortable outfit!
I am 5'3" and 170lbs, typically a 14-16 in most clothes. I ordered an XL, but honestly think I should have gone with a L instead. But I am wearing it for an outdoor wedding next week, so I don't have time to return it.
It doesn't have a care tag inside, but their description gives an idea how to wash it.
The legs are too long for me, but I expected they would be. I'm now looking for tall summer sandals, or possibly will try the iron-on hemming fix.
The top is a tad big, and gaps open when I bend over, exposing my bra. I will safety pin it to help.
The material is forgiving, and this is very cute on!
The background color is very dark navy. I had to look at it in several different types of lights indoors and then in the sunlight to make sure it wasn't black. Not a big deal, but just FYI.
Even with the sizing issues, I love it, and will work around them. That's why I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5.
The company is in the UK, and advertised 5-7 business days for shipping. I ordered it 7/15 and it arrived on 7/28, so it wasn't on time, but it barely made it for my trip, so that's good! They did not provide a tracking number, so that made me nervous, but all in all, I would order from them again.
Bottom line, order it! But if you're in between sizes, I would get the smaller size.

reviewText: perfect fit

Kofuti Canvas Rucksack for men and women successfully combines a nice design and all other characteristics for some Rucksack to become an everyday casual bag.

The main Rucksack pocket is closed with two nicely designed straps, while on the bag outside there are three additional pockets - one on the front closed with zip, and two more, one on each side, also closed with a zip. All of the outside pockets are easily accessible making them perfect for the things frequently put in and taken out of the Rucksack. The left and right zip pockets are bit smaller yet enough big for 0.5l bottle to fit in, while the front pocket is large enough for tablet or similarly sized things.

Inside, besides the main compartment that is big enough for 16 laptop, this Rucksack offers three additional compartments  one closed with zip and two slip pockets  overall much more than you would expect from a bag of this size.

The Rucksack is carried with adjustable shoulder strap combined with additional leather trims, though there is no additional protection on the bottom side against wear - the bag is of light weight, while due to the lack of hard bottom its shape is not predefined.

I am also very satisfied with the shipping process. It was flawless, a package though not too big, came in perfect condition 5 days after my order was placed.

This is the first casual canvas Rucksack I received for review and it made both my husband and myself feel very satisfied  this canvas Rucksack proved as nicely casual bag that can be used every day, both by women and men, due to its versatility, size and weight. I plan to update my review after spending some additional time in its company with fresh impressions.

I received a sample of Kofuti Canvas Rucksack at a discounted price for the purpose of testing and unbiased review, while all the presented information is based on my impressions.
summary: Casual everyday Rucksack for women and men

reviewText: This product fits my body perfectly and is quality material

Unisex Retro Rucksack made by Kofuti designer house is casual everyday bag for both women and men  its combination of neutral colors, lot of space it provides lasting materials and overall nice design this bag is kind of Backpack I would enjoy to have with me every day.

I received this Rucksack only 4 days after ordering it and shipping was performed in professional way  a package with nicely protected bag inside came with its content untouched.

The bag is carried with adjustable shoulder straps combined with additional faux leather trims, and given there is no additional protection on the bags bottom side against wear, its shape is not predefined. The important to emphasize is bag weight  I love its light weight!

This bag actually provides much more space compared to the expectations seeing it from the outside. The main pocket is closed with two nicely designed faux leather straps and it is big enough for 16 laptop. Plus, inside there are three additional compartments  one closed with zip and two slip pockets, one larger and the other enough sized for wallet or phone to fit in.

On the bag outside there are three additional pockets - one on the front closed with magnet, and two more, one on each side, also closed with magnets. All of the outside pockets are easily accessible making them a perfect storage for the things that are frequently taken out or put in bag. Both side pockets are a bit smaller, yet provide enough space to put inside 0.3l bottle for example, while the front pocket is somewhat bigger enable storing of larger smartphones or even tablet.

This is the first casual Bag I received at cheaper price for review purpose and I am very happy using it. In short time it became bag that I take with me when I am going outside with my friends because of its look and weight. Therefore my expectations are fulfilled and I can recommend this Retro Rucksack big time.

This Unisex Retro Rucksack was received at a discounted price for the purpose of testing and unbiased review, while all the presented information is based on my impressions.

reviewText: This is a very cute, simple, and very well made messenger bag. I bought it along side the Ogio Midtown Women's Laptop/Tablet Messenger Bag in black to compare them and I am keeping this messenger bag and returning the OGIO one. It was larger, bulkier, twice as expensive and looked more like a briefcase when carrying it and had a plastic lining. The stitching, material and strap on this messenger bag are all really sturdy. There were no reviews when I purchased it. I plan to add an iron-on patch or something to the outside to personalize it. There is a zippered compartment under the flap in the front that fits my 13" Macbook air perfectly and securely, and leaves a nice amount of space in a separate inner compartment for my notebook, textbooks (could fit a few) etc... The buttons keep the flap secured well. The change purse is cute.

reviewText: As a tall thin guy, it has always been a problem to keep my shirt tucked in until I discovered shirt stays about three weeks ago. I tried another brand of shirt stays that was fairly comfortable and did a slightly better job at keeping my shirt in place (and was easier to disconnect in case you have to do any sit-down business in the restroom.) The connectors broke on those after only two weeks of wear, so I tried this brand. They are supposed to be worn with the loop around your heel, but this would likely only work if your were about 4'6" tall: the straps are at least about two feet too short! I can still wear them as a 6'2" guy, but only because the loop is just big enough to be comfortably worn just under my knees! Its better than no shirt keepers at all, but I have since ordered another brand to see if I can get better.
One size does not fit all. If you are over 6' these will not lengthen to the height you need.

reviewText: I am a basketball referee and I was tired of the white rubber belt to keep my shirts tucked in.  I found these and have never looked back.  The clips are sturdy and have never come loose even with all the running and moving I do during a game.  The loop under the foot is not noticeable at all.  They have held up well through one basketball season--over 100 games--and numerous cleanings.  ( I do put them in a lingerie bag for washing).  Highly recommended for keeping those pesky shirtails contained.

Updated review: I ended up keeping the shirt because I missed the return window. Upon trying it on again, it did fit and is actually one of my favorite tops now. (Putting in the laces made all the difference in how it laid and fit.) The fit is just like the picture shows. I have washed the shirt one time in cold water and let it air dry flat. Some of the unfinished seams (like the ones inside the pockets, for example) have some fraying, but nothing terrible. It does feel like it shrunk a little bit, even though I used cold water and gently stretched it as it dried. I'm going to avoid machine washing as much as I can and would absolutely not put it in the dryer.

Original: This top runs slightly small. I typically wear a large for flowy shirts like this and this large did not fit across my chest (41"), even without the laces put in yet. Otherwise, the rest of the shirt (arms, waist, length, etc) seemed proportional and fit well.
The fabric does not feel cheap, but seems like it would be difficult to wash. The navy color is nice and dark enough to contrast with my dark jeans.
Unfortunately, I'm returning it due to the sizing issue. If it came in XL, I'd definitely be exchanging for it!
summary: Runs small, otherwise a nice top

This is a great deal for an adorable pajama set (or even a comfy play outfit!).  My 14 month old typically wears a 24 month/2T size, so I went ahead and ordered the 24 month size for this outfit.  It fits her just right, maybe a little bit big actually!  I washed and dried the outfit before she wore it, and did not notice any shrinkage or color fading.  The colors are vibrant and the kitty decal on the front is charming (it says You love me and I love you).  I did wash the shirt inside out, since the decal on the front appears to be the type that might crack over time.  The shorts have a fun ruffled edge along the bottom, which is very popular right now  and the whole outfit could absolutely be worn as a regular every day outfit, not just for pajamas.  I was happy with the quality of the material as well, the cotton is just the right weight; not too heavy, not too light  and its soft, which is a great bonus!  My daughter seems very comfortable in them, I would absolutely buy these again!

I received this outfit at a discounted price in exchange for my honest opinion; all of the information provided above is my personal assessment after receiving the outfit.

reviewText: nice and comfy

This is a pretty cute outfit!! I got the strawberry outfit in the 2 Year size for my 18 month old who is currently wearing a 2T and this fit perfectly. The fabric is a good weight cotton blend (95% cotton and 5% polyester), but it feels like only cotton. Very soft and cool. The colors are very vivid and very attractive, and the little strawberries have the cutest little faces on some of them. The "vest" is a tank top, just in case you were wondering, and the shorts are very nicely made. The elastic band in the shorts is very wide and seems really heavy duty, so I'm hopeful that it will hold up in the long term. The seams in both pieces are well done with no loose threads or crooked sections that I could see.

I actually really like that the shorts are longer than most little girl's shorts as I think they need to be kids and not be put in short shorts from early on. So I would steer clear of these if the though of somewhat longer shorts on your little girl would bother you. You wouldn't like these. These shorts came down to my little girl's knee, and the whole outfit looked and fit her like it would be very comfortable for her. Very nicely done! I'm very happy with this outfit!!

My only suggestion would be to add some sort of embellishment to make it stand out a little bit more. A little contrasting pocket, or a small flower in a pretty color. Something along those lines. This could easily be dressed up if you were handy and wanted to add the pocket or a flower or something around the neckline or whatever. And these would be great if used as separates for other cute pieces. This set still has lots of possibilities!

**I did receive this outfit for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review, but my cost has no bearing on what I rate a product. I would still be happy with my purchase if I had paid full price for this!**
summary: Super cute set! Not very extravagant, but still adorable on my girl! And I like that it's sort of plain.

I bought this mermaid outfit for my daughter Ariel.  Since her name is Ariel, no we did not name her after the Disney Princess, and she loves water she is always telling us she is a mermaid.  We were excited to find a mermaid tail that didn't cost a fortune and that we could wear in the pool.  My biggest complaint is the top.  It has two ties around the back and then one on the neck.  We found it difficult to judge how tight to tie it around the neck to keep the shells up without it tied around her back but then found it hard to tie it nicely around her back when it wasn't tied around her neck.  It took some tying and untying before we got it just right and even then it seemed like it didn't cover as much as my daughter would have liked.  The shorts idea was awesome.  She could wear those when she got tired of swimming with the fin.  The fin did make it more difficult to swim but she did have fun for a while.  We have decided that the swim suit is only to be worn in the home pool since it is a bit lose and revealing at times.  She does love the whole playing a mermaid and for that it is all worth it.

I did buy this at a reduced rate in return for my unbiased review.

reviewText: It's adorable and super comfy, but the neck part doesn't rest on your neck. It kind of sits up, it's weird. But I love the look of the shirt! The small even fits over my big 8 month belly!

This review is for the Yiyou Women Plus Size Deep V Neck Asymmetric Empire Waist Slimming Top Blouse (XXL, Navy Blue).

This is the cutest summer/spring top I have purchased this year! This top comes in a host of colors, but I got the nice navy blue one. The color is rich and deep, and when I receive it, it was wrapped in plastic to ensure freshness and newness.

The top is made with thick rayon with 5% spandex for stretch. I love natural fabrics and this is definitely soft and quality. Rayon also doesnt really wrinkle that much and washes PERFECTLY! When I first washed this top  it came out looking like new. There was NO shrinking, fading or tearing! This makes this type of top ideal for traveling since you can throw it in your suitcase and it comes out looking great!

The top has a lot of style. The sides hang down and give an elongated look. The front is also fairly long, I have a long stomach and sometimes shirts are short on me. I am 58 and this hangs down long enough. Also I got the XXL. It fits a size 14-16 perfectly. However, if you are 12-14 I would recommend getting the XL because I am losing weight and can tell this shirt will be soon too large. I will have to purchase another color in the XL!

The top sleeves are flirty and feminine and the neckline has elastic. This is because the top is designed to hang off shoulder. There is a drawstring on the neck line. This is great because it allows for the shirt to be as modest or sexy as you want. You can pull it down and create more cleavage for nights out. This is a great top and I recommend it to anyone looking for cute warm weather clothing! 5/5 stars

If you have any questions please post below and I would be happy to answer! I received a discounted promotional sample of this item for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: This top is perfect for the upcoming hot weather

reviewText:
Took a while for me to decide whether I will buy this in white size small with the varying reviews, but now I'm glad I did.

I am 5'4", wear size 2-4, and this fits as expected. It came in a plastic packaging (see photo) and came out wrinkled, but nothing that can't be undone with ironing or heat drying. The neckline measures 17.75" and the bustline was around 36.25". It did not shrink after washing. The fabric is light, almost like lawn cotton, breathable, and comfortable. Perfect for spring or summer. No stitches were out of place and I like that. If it were a better quality cotton, I'd give it 5 stars. But for the price it is a great buy and value. It shipped fast too.

The wrist ties provide versatile styling depending on how loosely or tightly these are knotted. As I am petite, the sleeves reach the top of my wrists, but if I knot the ties tightly, the sleeves can be 3/4 length. This top goes perfectly well with jeans and pants, tucked and untucked, and with both flats and heels. Its hemline is certainly cut high to the sides as the other reviewers said (see photo). I don't particularly mind this though. I also like it that chest portion of the neckline does not have elastic in them. The elastic starts on both shoulders and runs to the back. Unlike other off-the-shoulder tops, this one does not ride up my shoulders.  Overall I can see myself using this a lot, and would like to buy the other colors too.
summary: Good Purchase, Satisfied with this Top

These pjs are simply too cute! I absolutely love them and how they fit! I ordered these quite large so my daughter would be able to wear them for a while, and here are the pros and cons of the pair we got!

Pros:

1) I love the doggie on the front! It is a really nice applique and it seems to be applied to the fabric well. It is so stinking cute and it looks exactly like the picture so that is awesome! I have no concerns that this will come off or have issues with fraying around the edges, etc. Seems to be good quality and we have washed these PJs a few times already!

2) the material is thick! I like this as we have a kiddo who refuses to use blankets. It is a nice summer pj for kids who won't use blankets and yet still get a little chilly because we run AC all summer. This would be something to note if you generally do not use AC and are looking for a very lightweight fabric, though.

3) fit as expected. this is sizing that runs as expected, and I like that. Often times you order something online and it shows up and is either huge or TINY. Not this one - it is pretty dead on with sizing in the stores. and the seams and stitching seems to be well done with no visible errors or issues!

Cons:

1) the only con for me is that the dots are not the fabric coloring/paint, but rather like little iron on dots. So far they are holding up ok and this is not really an issue. I do not know if they will continue to hold up through multiple washes, but so far, so good! It is something to note, though if you are not into iron on things.!

Note: I received this product at a discount in exchange for an unbiased review.

reviewText:
Finally got this! It's really cute. I bought it for my granddaughter, who looks adorable in just about everything:) She'll be three in July and is on the small side. Usually wears cloths close to her age in size. Right now, she's in size 3T, but is still in pull ups, so I imagine the sizing will stay the same for a while once she's in underpants. I read through the reviews before ordering. Having ordered things for myself that were made in China, I usually go up in size or two. Thought these would be great as summer pajamas, or even to wear to preschool, to have extra outfit(s.)

We were babysitting last night, so I had an opportunity to hold it up to her. I had ordered a size 4/5, because I thought these would run small. The package had a size 5 on it, so I was leery about it size wise for this year. I was right. It was way too big for her right now. A 3/4 would have been right for this summer. Good news is that it should be great for next summer. DIL doesn't mind having a stock of next sizes, so it will work out well. It's so cute, I'm thinking of buying her some of the 3/4s for this summer.

I did receive a discount on this product with the expectation that I provide an honest review. This has no bearing on my rating and I review all products as if I had paid full price. My opinions are from my own personal experience with the product and I have no affiliation with the seller.
summary: Very cute, but it will be for next summer.

reviewText:
The minute I saw these doggie pjs online I thought my 2  year old daughter would love them.  She loves animals- especially kittens and doggies. As soon as the package came in I let her open it and as soon as she saw it she screamed with joy and said- Mommy, Mommy can I try it, can I have it, this is mine!!  I was impressed as well, these really did look sweet and super adorable! The pajamas have a short sleeve/pant, crew neck; they are pink with a cute doggie pattern embroidered on the shirt along with white and orange polka dots on the sleeves and pants. It's a semi thick patch, but it is lined in the back with white delicate fabric to add comfort. Pjs are made of 100% cotton, and seem and feel to be of descent quality and are quite cozy and comfy. Upon inspecting the pjs closely there appeared to be no lose threads or uneven stitching- they are well made.

As far as sizing goes, I think you definitely need to buy at least a size up, depending how big your daughter is. My daughter is 2  yrs old, but she is big (tall) for her age, she currently wears 4T, rarely 3T, so I got this set for her in size 4T (3-4 age) and it fits great. Its definitely not too lose for my liking, but definitely not tight at all, so hopefully she can wear it next year as well.although I do have an issue with the elastic waistband, its definitely on a tighter side, and she is tall and skinny so it fits her well, a bit too tight actually for my preference. Therefore if your girl is a little thicker or even average it might be a little too tight for her, hence I will probably need to cut it next year, but for now its fine.

I really do like the length of the pjs, the shorts fall just a little below her knees and the top falls way past the top of the shorts. Overall the pjs are super cute and they can be multi functional because they can be worn as not only pjs but an outfit too! And yes they are machine washable, I have washed them few times on delicate cycle and they haven't faded or shrunk. However, I did notice in one place in where the decal is stitched around the borders in one spot the embroidery is getting undone/ripping away just a little, I really do hope its just that one spot and that the whole appliqu won't start to rip. I will update this review should the quality worsen, for now I will give it 4 stars because nonetheless I really do like them and my daughter just loves them and they are just so endearing. I received this product for free or at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

We have ordered several items from Phoebe Cat, they are quickly becoming one of our favorites!  I ordered this set for my daughter.  One of the things that I LOVE about these sets is that I feel they can also be used as outfits, and there have been a few that my daughter just loves and wants to wear out, and thats ok.  I really liked the pattern of this set and the sewn on puppy applique.  We have washed it several times and everything has stayed in place and the colors have remained bright.  It fits my 3 year old well and she seems to be very comfortable in them.  Its already really hot here in Florida, and for my daughters purposes, pajamas with shorts are the best bet right now as she likes to use a blanket.  The stitching and craftsmanship on this item was well done, I did not find any loose stitching or holes.  Overall a great little pajama set.  I did receive this item at a discounted price to try the product and provide my experience in a review.  Please feel free to read my other reviews, we always give our honest opinions of the products that we try.
summary: Comfortable pajamas for our hot weather!  Holds up well in the laundry.

reviewText:
Since reading all of the rave reviews, I have been anxiously awaiting the arrival of the Phoebe Cat Girls Cotton 2-Piece Sleepwear Set that I ordered. I am pleased to say that I am not disappointed. I know these were made to be pajamas, but they are certainly nice enough to be worn as a short set. I love everything from the vivid pink color to the coordinating polka dots to the puppy appliqu. The fabric is a very soft cotton. It is lightweight enough for our Florida weather but heavy enough to hold its shape well. The entire garment is well stitched with no loose threads, and the elastic waistband is not scratchy at all. I ordered the size 4 for my 4-year-old granddaughter. Shes very petite, so I think she will be able to wear this all throughout the summer/fall. This is my first purchase from Phoebe Cat, but it won't be my last.
Disclaimer - I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I do not work for this company, nor do I know the seller. I am not under any obligation to provide a positive review and receive no incentives or rewards for doing so. I shop almost exclusively through Amazon and rely heavily on the comments of other reviewers to make my buying decisions.

This is so adorable. I bought these for my 3 year old granddaughter. She is very tiny and petite, so I guessed on the size and went for the 3-4 year old. I have found that most time when I order clothes from Amazon, they normally come in on the small size. My granddaughter, usually wears a 3T, and the 3-4 year old size fits perfect. This is made of 100% cotton, so I'm sure that it would shrink some in the dryer. When I washed this pair, I did it in cool water, then I layed them out on a counter to dry flat, and I seen no visible shrinking. I love the pattern on these pajamas, the polkadots, on the bottoms, and the are sleeves, are a wonderful accent to the puppy dog, or may it's the other way around. All I know is that as soon as she saw these, she was excited. She immediately went in and put them on. These are so cute, that if you didn't know that they were pajamas, you really would not be able to tell. I checked over the stitching and the hems, everything looks nice and straight. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for a fair and unbiased opinion.

My toddler daughter and I love these polka dot dog pajamas!

My three year old daughter is a very tall 45", and 42 lbs.  She typically wears 5T-6T in clothes, but I purchased a size 7 for this pajama set, so she'd have room to grow in them.  I also wanted them to be slightly loose so she'd be comfortable during sleep.  These fit my daughter just as expected - slightly large, but perfect for sleep!  The top is long and narrow - perfect for my tall thin daughter's body type.  The shorts have a fitted elastic waist and are a bit loose around the thighs, with a slightly fitted bottom hem.  These look adorable on my daughter!

These are made of 100% cotton and after a wash and dry, they are super comfortable.  It is recommended to wash these inside out in warm water and dry on low heat.  I'm sure that's to preserve the detailed puppy design.

These pajamas are nice and lightweight, which is great for my little girl who tends to heat easily when she sleeps.

We love that these are tag less, adding to the comfort of these pjs!

My kiddo loves dogs, polka dots and the color pink, so when she saw these there was lots of screaming and jumping up and down. I'd say she approves! These are by far the one pair of pajamas she asks to wear to bed every night!

The shirt in the picture is not at all what I received. Please bare with me as I want to tell you a story. I ordered this shirt on March 25, 2016. It came in the mail a few days ago. When I opened it I was startled by the material, I had no idea what it was because it didn't look like anything I'd ordered. I put it in my review queue and didn't think anything else about it.

I was browsing Facebook tonight when I got one of those "PEOPLE ALSO SHARED" recommendations after I read an irrelevant Buzzfeed story. It suggested that I read an article titled, "Say No To The Dress." The article had an image next to it that provoked a memory, I thought, "That's the shirt I ordered on Amazon!" The TLDR is the Buzzfeed article discusses counterfeit items being sold on Facebook. I've known of this practice and prided myself in sniffing out a scam.

After reading the article I come back to Amazon a dig through my orders to find the shirt in question. At this point, I'm convinced it was that shirt I received that I didn't recall ordering. It looked exactly like the Buzzfeed image except mine was black and not gray. It didn't take long and here am at this listing looking at the same model in a shirt that looks nothing like what I ordered.

At this point, I'm offended and feel used. I feel like someone expected us reviewers to give them a good reputation for their counterfeit product. Had I not stumbled on to this article I still would have questioned their authenticity. I would have let people know that this is not a cotton T-shirt like the one the model is wearing. Then I would have reviewed it based on the quality of what I received. I would never have expected that I was being used to support a counterfeit operation.

If this product were listed for what it actually is I would have recommended it. It's not a terrible shirt. The listing is deceptive but more importantly they are taking advantage of reviewers like myself to build a reputation they don't deserve.

I hope you enjoyed this review. If you have any questions about my experience please leave me a comment. I will be happy to follow up on my experience with this product.

ProEtrade Women's Plus Size Swimdress Printed Swimsuit Beachwear Plus Bikini Swimwear (10, Light Blue)I am comparing the following 3 swim suits I bought this week. I want to go to the gym and sit in the spa at the end. I picked these 3 items because I don't want to shave my private part every time when I want to put on the swim suit. These 3 swim suits all does a great job covering the bikini area. Two of them are 2 piece design and one is one piece design. My size, normally I wear size 8 petite for bottom and large for top. Bust size: 38" widest, wear 34C and 36C Victoria secret full coverage only, may need a bigger size if not full coverage. Waist: 30", butt: 36"; height: 5 ft 4". I can put all of them on without any problem. I am returning 2 and keeping the one that is most comfortable. Size information for B01D8K7HOA: I ordered size 10 as more people think it's bigger than expected than smaller than expected. - Straps are adjustable from 9" to 16" - Bust: is 30" measure flat, removable bra circle is 5" diameter - Waist: as this is a 2 piece design, these is not really waist area, the part after the bra goes from 30" to 36" wide. - Bottom: boy short 26" flat and you can stretch it out to 32" - From the top to bottom, it measures 18" Feedback: - I like the boy short, but I like this one the least. Although the bra padding can be removed, this is the most basic kind that I don't like. It is not designed for someone with huge top as there is no wire support like the other 2. I don't like the back (halter), I have a hard time to tight it. The position is too high and the fabric is too smooth and it keeps sliding away from my finger tips. I would rate this 75/100 compared to the other 2. /// Size information for B01H59GO1W: purchased size L based on size chart: 38.5-40" chest - Waist is around 28" - When lay flat without stretching, the bust area measure 32" (without counting the curve of the cups) - From top (where the bust area) to bottom of the skirt measure 20" Features that I like: - Adjustable shoulder straps, you can change it from 7" and extend to whole length of 14", I find the strap slightly uncomfortable - supportable wired cup - Removable padding, you can remove it if it does not fit you. I find the padding slightly bigger than the available area. It is difficult to pull it out, and flatten it out and have it turns and faces the right way after I try to put it back in. Feedback: One piece design: depends on your height, you may find it better to buy 2 pieces if you are much taller than me or you wear different sizes of bottom. I think this is perfect for someone who does not have huge tops. If you have more than C cup, you may not like this one. It maybe good for someone who is between 5 feet to 5 feet 7 based on the length and the shoulder strap. I do look slimmer in it, especially the waist area based on the design. As I am not that tall, although it fits me (not too tight, not too loose), I look "wide" in it based on the proportion of the dress and my body shape. I am returning it as I feel the cup padding area is smaller than my actual chest, and I rate this as 85/100 based on its quality and comfort. /// Size information for B01GX3BT9I size 12, I ordered this size based on my bust. - Strap is not adjustable, it measures 14". As it is wider than B01H59GO1W, I find the strap more comfortable. - Bust: is 28" measure flat, meaning, this one come with big curve bra and wired cup, and I can not measure all the curves. I only measure from the back in a straight line. - Waist: as this is a 2 piece design, these is not really waist area, the dress is 36" wide after the bra cups. - Bottom: straight is 30" but you can stretch it out to 36" - From top to bottom, it measures around 25". Features that I like: Flexible 2 piece design is great if you need a smaller or bigger bottom. What I like the most is the bra and built in wired. It is really comfortable. Before I tried it on, I was thinking, the bra looks way too big for me. Actually, it gives great support. However, this built in support / wired bra cannot be removed. Final thought: The layering (cross over) of fabric in the front is a little bit strange, where my finger is pointing. What I don't like about it, I am kind of chubby, so with that said, this dress does show some meat piling up below the bra area, and above the waist area on the sides. Depends on how much meat you have on your body and your back, they may be squeezed into layers. It is good for someone want excellent support for their big headlights. This is the one that I am keeping, I rate this 90/100. I purchased this product at a reduced price to complete and post a factual review without compensation. Positive reviews are earned only through positive product attributes and performance. [...]

reviewText:
When i was looking for a new iphone case, i didn't think one could really make much difference in my phone using experience. A case is to protect the phone and inject a little personality into it. But to my surprise, once i put the case on, I found it actually made a large improvement for me in my enjoyment of using the phone. Buttons feel easier to press and the non-slip texture on the side is perfect for keeping a grip on the phone while not being bulky or cheap feeling. Plus, it looks really inviting.

I used to have a silicone case that looks like a cassette, which worked well and cost $9, so I really wasn't super ready to spend almost $30 on a case, but I am getting well over $30 more enjoyment out of this extremely well made case. Very very happy with this purchase.
summary: what a difference this case makes!

As an Amazon prime member, I participate in review programs.  These programs offer products that I receive at a discounted price in exchange for product feedback that is honest and unbiased.

My reviews look at the entire product offers from function to presentation and quality.  I help buyers understand the product uses in practical life situations.  You can trust the reviews and please note if my review was helpful.  My view has not been influenced in any way.  I have been a prime member for 7+ years and I depend on product ratings in my initial search and read feedback from others.  Lastly, I rarely purchase any product 3 stars or less.  Amazon is dedicated to ensure that we are protected from fraud and poor quality service and product.

Using the sizing chart worked fine for me.  Ordered US Large.  Received product that was labeled XXLarge, but that was probably due to the conversion of Asian to US sizes.  Fit fine and when measured, they fell into the size range that the size chart listed for US L. So I got what I ordered. I like the fit and the length as I don't like long shorts.  They do have a zipper in the front but the waste band does not open in the middle. Once solid elastic band around the waste which is no problem for me.  They have belt loops, but don't I don't need them since the elastic works just fine. The back pocket is a bit more to the side of the hip rather than in the back like most shorts, but I like this better because then I don't sit on my wallet.  The back pocket is also slightly smaller than a normal back pocket so it fits the size of most normal size wallets better. I like that they have a little styling to them (ie contrast color material around pockets so they don't look like generic shorts.  I wish it had Velcro rather than buttons on the pockets since the buttons are too big to fit through the button holes so they seem to be more for looks. Can't expect too much for this price though.
summary: Using the sizing chart worked fine for me

It's a nice thick waist trainer that has straps to hold the trainer in place. The snaps have 3 levels to be able to adjust sizing as you lose or gain weight. The straps are adjustable as well. I ordered a little small so that I would have to squeeze in and get maximum benefit. I will only be wearing mine at home and to sleep in, but if you plan to wear yours all the time I would suggest using the sizing chart so as not to be too uncomfortable. I am very curvy and have hips and a large butt so waist trainers always bunch up on my back and hips. That's the only reason i won't wear mine throughout the day, because it makes my clothing lumpy. But if you aren't curvy you should be fine. I have tried several trainers before and I like this one best so far because of the straps. I got this at a discount in exchange for a review. If you have any questions please feel free to ask. Oh, in my experience, if you will be wearing your trainer for many hours a day I would order 2-3, so that you have one to wear while one is being washed.

I'd give this belt five stars if it had come with any information about how to unbuckle it. I had never used a belt like this before, but when it arrived  I had no trouble putting it on. When I tried to take it off, however, I couldn't figure out how to use the lever underneath the belt buckle to release the catch. I push. I pulled. I lifted (apparently not far enough). My wife did the same, without any more success than I had. I finally got so frustrated I headed for the kitchen to get a knife to cut the belt off. Luckily, on the way, I got so angry I power-jerked the belt off. When I cooled down, I experimented with it until I found that if I pushed the lever up AS FAR AS I COULD PUSH IT, the catch released and I could back the belt out of the teeth that holds it in place. West: For those people like me who are all thumbs, please provide a diagram showing (1) how to push the belt through the buckle to cinch it up, and (2) how to release the catch. It doesn't even have to have words--just a simple diagram will do. Now that I've figured out the system, I'll likely get a brown belt to go with my black one. I like the all-leather, supple belt that I bought, and I like the buckling system--now that I know how to work it. By the way, I had to get a belt two sizes larger than my normal belt size because that was the smallest offered. One size larger is more than sufficient.
summary: A Good Belt, but New Users Need Some Instruction
