reviewText: Works for my lite use.

Despite buying the full grain version, this was not full grain leather. This belt has a perfectly repeating pattern of artificial hair pores which were obviously embossed and stamped into a coating with a heavy finish. This is known as corrected grain leather which is at best classified as top grain. Full grain leather should have it's natural grain unaltered. The belt I received also appeared to be two layers of leather bonded together, as seen by its cross section.

The item name is misleading because despite having full grain in it's name, half of the different colors/styles are labelled top grain.

The first time I purchased it, I also received a box labeled with wrong version of this belt, and the box contained a cheap belt from another manufacturer. I had to return it in order to finally get the right version the third time.

reviewText: At the price, the product was beyond my expectation. Good quality leather and a nice looking buckle that works great. Here's a tip. Find the small release button on the bottom side of the buckle before you put it on or, like me, you'll be puzzled with how to release it. I highly recommend it.

Finally put on my new belt today. Good quality stylish belt. I love the smell of new leather. This belt doesn't disappoint. It is extremely easy to put on, take off, and adjust (can all be done with one hand). The ratcheting buckle is a great design and so easy to use. The buckle is well casted and the design is nice. The look and feel of the leather is smooth and the stitching is perfect. They did a good job dying/tanning and preparing the leather before it turned into a nice belt. I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review. For someone who usually looks for functionality before style/fashion, I'm glad I picked a belt that does both so well. The belt can be put on with one hand (with a bit of practice). It can also be taken off with one hand, and quite easily I might add (no practice required). The racheting system is well engineered. Great belt. Works great and looks good doing it.
summary: Put on my new belt today.

This sports bra is very good looking and fits great. The bra is a nice speckled dark gray with almost black mesh and gray/green swooshes on the back with a OUDIKE logo on the front. I got the medium and its nearly perfect for a 34B. The padding actually works well in this bra and has a built in curvature that maintains a nice almost full look even with the compression you would expect from a sport bra.  Its more important than it normally would be with the mesh cutout in the front so unlike most bras in general the padding gets to stay in.  The mesh cut out is very cute and sexy and the mesh area in the back is very comfortable and both make it breathe very well.  The elastic is very comfortable and it offers great support to keep everything where it should be and it looks great. I was concerned about the fit based on some of the reviews but it seemed to be exactly the size I thought it would be so I did a good job ordering this time. If you are looking for something a bit more attractive than the average sports bra that offers good coverage and support but still looks a little fun and flirty then this is a good fit. Its true that this tie is short. Luckily I'm a short guy and slender (5'6") so it fits me well but if I was taller or had a big belly I would look a bit like a fool wearing this tie. However, with my size it fits just about perfect with the bottom ending just above my belt buckle. I'll measure the full length of the tie when I get a chance and update this review.

Why 3 stars though...well within a month the thing on the back that holds the inner tie to the front broke and I had to re-sew it on. I noticed that a lot of the stitching on the main tie is a bit loose and I would be surprised if this tie lasts me a year with my using it about 15 days out of the month. The zipper quality so far seems fine, and the look is nice in general and I have received quite a few compliments. I'd give it 3.5 stars if I could because it really isn't bad for the price, I've had similar issues with more expensive ties. I've also had a lot of issues with ties being too long for shorter guys like myself. All that being said, I'd probably buy it again and just have my sewing kit ready.
summary: It works for me, but probably won't for most guys.

reviewText:
I love the color, but the leather is rather stiff and needs some wearing in. The belt loop is also not fastened in place so be careful losing it when you take it off. I had to add a couple extra holes, which is pretty easy if you have the right tools. If you don't, try heating up the end of a screw driver until it starts to change color on you, mark the place where you want the new hole, and quickly, with lots of pressure, try to push the heated screw driver through. Once you have weakened the place where you would like the new hole, take a single hole puncher to it. You're welcome!
Anyhow, the smell is strong so if you aren't keen on animal skin smell, you might want to rub it down with a scent, because you will smell the leather from your pants. The only thing I can say I didn't especially like about the design of this belt, is that the buckle is not removable. I like to change things around sometimes, so I was disappointed to see that it was sewn on there... Probably nothing I can't remove myself, but they created a little extra work for me... So that's the only reason I'm giving this 4 instead of 5.
The color was very true to the picture and was exactly the color I was looking for. Overall, love it, will be wearing it often.

I received this product at a discounted price for my honest and thorough review.
summary: Love the color, design could have been better, but I love the product.

reviewText:
The item comes nicely packaged in a brown gift box with the company name on the box. Easily giftable as a gift. The belt comes wrapped in plastic and the buckle is wrapped as well in a plastic cover. The length of the belt is sufficient and can add holes by yourself if you need to adjust the number of holes since the belt easily fits medium sized bodies.

To begin with, the belt I received as seen in the picture is not the same as what I received as seen in the pictures. So my review only covers this belt. The belt as a silver buckle instead of the picture gold. I will update this review if I am able to get the correct product. There is no gold accent where you insert the belt but is black. This is a standard belt which allows you to insert the belt into the buckle using the holder. Then, use the sizer to size your size by inserting the needle into the appropriate hole.

The belt is of solid quality and the buckle is ok. The holder in which you place the nonbuckle side through is held together by a metal clasp. I think that this is a flaw and can break off after reasonable use. Not sure if that is waterproof for this as well.

Overall, the quality of the belt is of high quality but the belt holder is questionable and the fact I received the wrong product prevents me from giving this item 5 stars.

I have received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review for the product. I am in no way affiliated with the seller or product. I write reviews based on previous experience with similar products. I hope you find this review helpful
summary: Received wrong belt but decent quality

I really like this belt.  The inside is not smooth like the outer part, but the outside is silky smooth.  It's a handsome belt, and the leather feels sturdy and of good quality. reviewText: The belt is fine but it was much bigger than I expected a small to be. It was closer to a large size. It was on sale, so I will add more holes so it fits better, but that was disappointing.

This is a good no-frills belt for the price charged.  However belt length and easy-to-lose belt loop decreased my rating.  The belt came with a hole punch in case you need to add another hole to shorten the belt.  (The hole punch makes a round hole whereas the other pre-existing holes on the belt are oval shaped.  This different hole shape will be unnoticeable since the buckle hides the hole.) Note, the belt size does run large.  I wear a size 6/8 and ordered size Small due to the other reviews.  At its shortest, the belt measured 33 inches and was loose on my natural waist!  This size worked ok for pants that ride on the hips but I will probably punch another hole to make the belt shorter for those pants that sit on my natural waist.  There are 2 belt loops on the belt.  One is secured and stays next to the buckle.  The 2nd belt loop is loose and "float" around the belt.  It can easily come off when you hang it on a hook.  It would be much better if the loop wrapped around the belt tighter so it does not fall off.  Lastly, this belt is only 3/4" thick so it may be too thin for jeans.  It would work better for dress pants.
My friend, who has worked with leather for over 30 years, has shown me how to tell real leather from fake. This belt is fake.

reviewText:

I am very pleased to leave my eview for this beautiful leather belt. I am a slim, petite woman who has the toughest time finding a good belt anywhere.  I find the belt selections in the store to always be way to large - unless I go into the kids section. I can pretty much forget about ever finding anything to try on so I am left to order belts online, which is typically a 50/50 shot. Its so frustrating.  Belts on me typically end up being way too long (even in the smallest size) or too wide so that I can't fit the belt through the loops of petite pants or if they fit, the holes do not end up being available so I have to use a hole punch to make holes that fit my waist.  Its been a frustration almost my entire adult life. I opened the mailing package and inside was an unexpected presentation box.  It was perfectly ready to give as a gift right there.  I then opened the box and the belt was inside of a cotton bag. Wow!  What a very nice "surprise and delight" before I even got my hands on the product.  The box was a chocolate brown and the bag inside was a lighter brown. Great styling in the packaging alone so I couldn't wait to see the belt.  I opened the bag and the belt was rolled up and it came inside of plastic protective covering.  The belt buckle had its own sturdier plastic.  This belt was shipped carefully and well protected.  I removed the belt and the leather smell was intoxicating.  It is such a beautifully styled product.  It is braided leather, which is PERFECT for me.  I don't ever have to worry about punch holes - the entire belt has holes.  It fit through the belt loops perfectly, as well.  I put it on and it secured nice and tight.  The loose end was not too long (which is normally the case on me). I honestly cannot believe that I found the perfect belt when I wasn't even looking.  I bought the black leather option.  Its an even color, high quality leather, and the buckle is not gaudy gold, its a very light colored tint which is the perfect compliment.  Overall I highly recommend this product, especially if you have issues with size.  This one is great for larger waists and hips as well as smaller.  With this many holes there is not anyone this belt will not fit.  I then I can't believe the price.  The quality for price is outstanding. I will most definitely be ordering it in brown at full price now.  I would buy this one belt over and over to use as my standard go-to.  There is no doubt.  Out of all of the products I have tested so far, this is by far the most useful for me and has me the most excited.  Never thought a belt would do that, but if you have trouble finding belts that fit BUY BUY BUY this product.  You will not be sorry about that choice.  Note that I received this item from the seller at a discount in exchange for an honest review.  My reviews are purely my opinion and are not influenced at all by the seller or the discount I received. If you believe my review has helped you, feel free to mark that it has been useful.
summary: This belt is a MUST BUY for all size waists.  Quality, great styling, great presentation, great price. Fabulous all around belt.

- If you are looking for a great gift idea, you found it

 I do like the wallet as it seems to be well constructed and the leather seems to be of a decent quality. There are plenty of card slots where I keep my most used cards - and places underneath those slots where I can store other things that are less often used, but needed. I do like having two separate compartments in the money (bill) area, as my previous wallet had that and I found that I could easily separate my dollar bills from other papers and such that I might need to keep in my billfold.

I really don't have any way to test the effectiveness of the RFID blocking other than to take the manufacturers word that it does. I guess I could take an RFID tag off of an item in a store and put it in my wallet and see if I could get out the door, but I don't want to end up in jail ;-). I would be curious to know of a way to test this if anyone knows of one  please feel free to add a comment to my review.

I received this product for free or at a discount in exchange for my honest review, but I assure you that I did test out the product thoroughly and my review is honest and unbiased.
My reviews are all written after receiving and testing the product.
My reviews are written with the actual sale price in mind, and not the discounted rate.
I was not influenced in any way by the seller or Amazon, and my opinions are mine alone based on my personal experience with the product.
I try to cover all the basics that I would look for in a review as I know reviews help us all make decisions when making a purchase.
As with all products, longevity is not something that can be reviewed after initial testing, and I will update my reviews if I encounter any issues.

This is such a very well-made bi-fold wallet for men. I was very much impressed with the presentation of this wallet when I received this on hand.  Not only did the presentation impress me but as well as its high quality.  The leather that has been used as material for this is truly a good one.  I like the texture of this wallet as well as its color.  I like how black it is.  This will always looked like brand new even in the passing of time, which is really nice as I do not like the old of an old wallet.  I like this as it is slim even though I have already put all of my stuff in there, it does not look and feel bulky or heavy at all.  I also liked that it has enough slots and compartments to accommodate all of my credit cards and other important identification cards.  This wallet really holds everything that I want in for a wallet.  The compartment that is transparent is perfectly right for my driver's license which made it so convenient for showing my ID without it taking it out of my wallet.  The slots are also nice as they can very much keep your cards intact and safe.  They are not too tight nor loose, thus there is an ease of putting in your cards as well as taking them out.  Another very nice feature of this thing is its RFID feature.  I am more on the preventive stuff so I am so happy that this will protect me from being a possible victim of identity theft.  Nowadays, we really have to be more cautious about it.  Overall, this was such a very nice gift for myself and a very worthy purchase of my money.
I was able to get this very nice item on a discount and I am glad to share to you all as well my fair and honest feedback about it.  My review on this product was based on my experienced with it through testing it or using it after receiving it.

It smells and feels like real leather upon arrival. Its all black and does not make cracking sound like majority of the other RFID blocking wallets I saw. It has Protectify brand name embedded on it, on the front as well as inside. This is a typical, classic mens style wallet, that possesses 6 slots for credit cards, one additional clear window slot for an ID and two bill compartments. The wallet closes flat and measures approximately 4.5'' wide by 4'' tall by 0.5'' when closed. It is 8.5'' long when opened. It comes with a 1 year limited warranty but its obvious that it will last much longer than this.

It arrives nicely packed in a black gift box, and additional foil plus a thin cardboard from both sides for extra protection. It is well manufactured, it definitely won't fall apart. I must admit, that I have seen similar wallets that appeared of a slightly better quality than this one, but they were much more expensive. For the previous reason this wallet would not have been my first choice but is handsome and will do the job, for the price is a good deal, especially that it comes ready for gifting.

These are decent socks. The construction, fit, and feel are actually better than I expected. Not too thick, but for thin(ish) socks, they feel good. reviewText:
This review is for the Fool's Day Mens/Womens Polka Dot Trend Fashion Personality Color Floral Pattern Socks.

These popsicle socks are SOOOOO CUTE! I purchased the size medium/large. I am a size 9 foot and it works perfectly for me. These are substantial socks and go up the leg a ways and keep me nice and warm. They are high quality, not like the cheap types you get at Target or Wal-Mart. I think if you are less than a size 8 foot, I would recommend getting a small/medium size. These are designed for both male and female feet so the sizing is unisex.

The fabric on these is tight weave screen printed cotton. It says on the front of the sock card hand linked toe so the toe is incredibly sturdy and your feet won't be going through it anytime soon. The screen printing on these is BEAUTIFUL. It is VERY vivid and bright. The color is rich, true, and there are no spotty places the ink didn't print. It is full 360 printing. The wash instructions recommend Cold water, line dry I would imagine over time if you just throw these in the regular wash they may fade from the ink of the printing. However, if you heed the wash instructions these will stay nice for years to come.

The popsicles are neon yellow, pink and chocolate on top with sprinkles. They have wooden sticks. The background is black. The tops have elastic banding that keep these secure up your leg and they don't fall down or start to bunch up. There is a little insignia of the companys name Fools Day on the upper elastic banding. They are ULTRA soft and highly comfortable for all day wear. I really recommend these and want to get some other prints! They are SO FUN! 5/5 stars

If you have any questions please post below and I would be happy to answer! I received a discounted promotional sample of this item for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText:
I'm comfortable giving this review sample 4+Stars, and here's why...

I've been wearing them for three days, day and night, with sneakers, and two different pairs of hiking boots, and I've been wearing them around the house without shoes.

Not in any order, I've hiked in them, flown a kite in them, chased after my granddaughter on her bike in them, moved my 14' skiff in them, skipped rocks in them, collected firewood in them, gardened in them, worked on my tractor in them, gone for a two mile walk in them, washed my boat in them, stood around and done nothing in them, slept in them two nights in a row, tried to wrestle a snapping turtle into the woods in them, written an Amazon review in them.

I'm still comfortable, and the socks are holding up well despite my attempts at destroying them.

I ordered the camouflaged ones.

Note: Sample provided for review.

Note #2: I have taken them off to shower. I'm not a complete bohemian.
Everyone loved them and are still using them to carry their ID's and other items while visiting the country.  Great product, great price.

reviewText: Wonderful in wearing

I lost a massive amount of weight (an entire person worth of it) a few years ago so I have quite a bit of loose skin on my tummy and upper thighs. I also have gigantic boobs. This makes it very difficult to find a bathing suit that fits (I'm for reference, I'm 5'10" and a size 4/6 with a 30F bra size) but doesn't show my tummy and upper thighs. I've tried a lot of swim dresses and they never seemed long enough to cover the very tops of my thighs and the chest was almost always too small. I can deal with that as long as it supports the girls, but because I am so tall, the bust is usually pretty low. I can't find two piece bottoms that either are high enough to conceal the worst of my loose skin or that cover my upper thighs (I can get one but not both).
I tell you all of this so you can understand that I have searched high and low for a swimsuit I feel comfortable in.
This suit is awesome. First of all, it is long enough to cover my upper thighs, which are thick, without digging into them. It's not so long that it looks prudish. The body of the suit is very comfortable. The halter brings the cups high enough to provide great support. My chest doesn't QUITE fit, but it's close enough. I would guess that someone with a larger band size and a D or even a large C would fit better. You definitely do need boobs, though. It won't work for small chested women.
I wear a 4/6 in pants and bought this in a 6/8, since swimsuits tend to run small. The suit was very comfortable and plenty roomy so I would say that someone who is a 6/8 could wear it comfortably.
One thing to note is that the body is pretty long. I don't think this suit will work for short women. I am 5'10" and this probably had an inch or two more length in the torso than even I needed.
Bottom line, though? This is the first suit I have ever felt even remotely confident wearing. It's not perfect, but I love it.
summary: Comfortable and flattering. Probably best for tall, busty women.

reviewText:
I absolutely love this bathing suit! It is super cute and I definitely love how it allows me to feel modest and sexy at the same time!
I am 5'4" and weigh approximately 135 lbs. I have large breasts and wide hips, so my measurements were such that I ordered a Large (US 12-14?). The bathing suit seems to fit pretty well, though it is perhaps just a little bit (a VERY LITTLE bit) larger than I would like in the crotch area, but I can't say I really mind that. Also, I would definitely agree with the reviews that I have read concerning this bathing suit not necessarily being the best choice for those of us with larger busts. It definitely accentuates that feature (which is not necessarily a bad thing) and it can feel like you're falling out of it a bit. Also, I did find that I had to tighten the halter straps quite a bit, which hurt my neck a bit initially but was fine in the end.
Also, I remember reading a review concerning the bathing suit having a "chemical" smell. I noticed this when I first unpacked it so I soaked it in cold water with some baking soda and then washed it by hand with a little bit of detergent and the smell went away completely.
summary: Cute, sexy bathing suit! And for the right price!

reviewText: really small fit

This purse was exactly the size and style I was looking for. It's small but adventure-y. The perfect size to fit all of my essentials in, and also a  Unfortunately, I accidentally shipped it to my school while on summer break, and it sat in a hot and very humid building covered in plastic and cardboard for a month before I was finally able to retrieve it. Because of this, my purse was covered in mildew, glue or something had melted and stained around the buttons, and the buckles appear to be rusty. This is not at all ADIMANI's fault. My area had an especially hot and humid summer. It seems like it would have been a nice purse. The green canvas lining is a nice addition, and at a glance, there appears to be three sections and two additional zipper pockets on the inside.

I am going to attempt to clean and restore the purse, but I don't know if I can save it. If I can't fix it, I will still be very likely to purchase from ADIMANI again. I'm tempted to not even care about the stains and pretend it's part of the "vintage" look. The moral of the story is to not let the purse sit in it's box under poor conditions for a long time or else sadness will happen. But again, that is my fault.
summary: I think it would have been nice.

Please get some more NOW!

To review this, I gave it to the toughest possible tester on the planet.  My 16 year old Bohemian bra hating daughter.  She won't wear a normal Victoria Secret type bra, and only wears sports bras.  She is impossible to please.  She wears a 34b in a normal size, and xl in sports bras.  I bought (for a substantial discount in exchange for a review) this bra in size XL.  It fits her perfectly.  She put it on, and  declared  " it was her new favorite bra."

The bra is of the highest quality, it has no adjustable straps and fits perfectly from the get-go, no pulling or adjusting or trying to cinch things up.  Also, in my opinion, it's not a slutty outfit.  If you were wearing it for Yoga or to the gym as an outfit, it is a soundly sports minded garment.  It doesn't pop the cleavage out, it doesn't say "here they are, come take a gander", and honestly, is modest.  It is slightly padded, mostly to hide the pointy anatomy parts.  A good bra is like a sheep dog, it rounds em up, & points em in the right direction. A great bra does the job and you forget you're wearing it.  According to my test subject, this one is 'Great'.

The first thing I want to say is this should not be marketed as a high impact sports bra, there is minimal movement reduction.

The compression is just not there- I would use this for yoga and weight lifting where I frequently don't find high compression necessary.  I absolutely would not use this to run or for anything involving jumping.

It is however, very cute and comfortable.  I like the fabric feel, I like the color design, you feel like you still have a shape unlike some sports bras.  I'm not totally in love with where the chest seams are, just as a matter of cosmetics.

I got a Medium, I'm a 32C, and I felt it was loose to be a sports bra- but comfortable if you wanted to use it for layering or low impact activities.

My rating would have been a 4 if it had been listed as a low-impact sports bra.

First, I received this jacket free for testing and review. I recognize that a review of a free product is something fundamentally different from that of a product for which one has paid, but I do believe that reviews can be useful when the review process is respected and I've tried to do that here.

Appearance: This is an ultra lightweight jacket and it is sheer. Center zip front with small pocket over left chest and waist is elasticized.  High collar rides to the top of the neck and the hood can be rolled and tucked into this collar (velcro tabs keep it secure) if you don't want it to drape down the back.

Fit: Runs a bit on the small side but if you're using it for running, hiking etc... you may be looking for a tighter fit. Order a size up if you're looking for a loose fit.

Build: Lightweight nylon that is almost unbelievably light.  Excellent as a windbreaker and for mildly chilly temps.  Does offer resistance to water and will keep you dry in a light rain.  However, it is not waterproof and a steady rain will eventually make its way through.  Design is nice and I like the hood being able to roll into the collar.  Elasticized sleeve cuffs and waist help keep water out.

Anything else of note?:
-Eligible for free shipping to members of Amazon Prime
-Free returns

Any negatives?:
-Runs small, order a size up.

Bottom line: This ultra-lightweight jacket is an excellent wind breaker and provides protection from a light rain but is not waterproof.  Works well as an outer shell for cool weather hiking and running. I really like this design and its function is excellent for its price range.

I'm so disappointed in this dress though because there is no way to wear this in public appropriately without having to wear a full length black slip underneath it, which seems a bit ridiculous for a casual cotton dress like this. The entire dress is so thin you can easily see everything underneath which for a black dress you typically don't have issues with black being see-through but this one you see everything through it. Even wearing nude underwear/bra wouldn't help since you can still see your entire body through it. With the material being so thin to start as well, I'm afraid after a few washes it might even get thinner/become more see-through. I had a t-shirt once that did that and it started off as a thicker (not see-through) but similar material style as this, but after several washes became too thin to be able to wear without putting another layer under it. This one is starting off being way too see-through sadly. :(

I love this dress! Super fun peice to have in the closet. The cat motif is well done and figure flattering, and shipping was almost a month early!

It's a classic racerback cut, no surprises there, and it did fit just slightly smaller than expected. Still very wearable (and comfortable!) but a little more of a bodycon fit than I was expecting. There is plenty of room for a slip though, which is good, because while the material is super soft and comfy, it is Pretty transparent, even in black! For me this works as a plus, as you can wear a full length slip for full coverage or something a little sexier for a subtle edge. I do intend to hand launder it, to keep it nice longer.

All in all I'm very happy with this addition to my wardrobe! This one is definitely worth it's minor shortcomings and I recommend taking a chance on it.

I did receive this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I love the halter back, also, since regular straps tend to fall off of my shoulders. The fabric is super comfortable and the perfect weight - not too thin, not too thick. This will definitely be a summer favorite!

I love buying clothes for my wife. I saw this beautiful classic black dress and I had to see her in it. It has such a lovely classic look and yet it is casual enough for summer wear. She loved it the moment she put it on. It fits her beautifully. She is tall and slender, so it accentuates her figure without being "too much" or too traditional. The lace is every so slightly see-through, but in a very tasteful.  A lady could wear this dress just about anywhere without any worries at all.  And yet, it is very sexy. The black color is true to the pictures in the advertisement, but the buckle design was much simpler than in the picture.  The buckle on our dress is fine, so it made no difference that is was different. The lace is very classic and nicely sewn. Although the dress will need some pressing before she wears it the first time, it looks to me like it shouldn't be too much trouble to regularly maintain. My wife is 5 foot 10 and slender. The size large fits her beautifully. The bottom hem hits her right at the knees. The XL would have been too large. The dress has a lovely tapered waist without being too tight or exaggerated.  The pictures don't show it, but the ends of the arms have button cuffs that look really nice when buttoned around the elbows.  Again, its just a nice tasteful addition to the look of this classic dress. The material is high quality and very soft. The buttons around the lace are cute and nicely designed. I received a discount for a fair and unbiased review of this dress, but I love it and would highly recommend it. The quality of the dress is above average for this price range. Everything was nicely sewn and stitched without too many hanging or loose threads. We shop for a lot of clothes for her job and I'd say this dress is easily the quality of what you'd find at Maceys in the states. Highly recommended.
summary: Beautiful classic black dress.  Great quality!

I kept this one on my wish list for the longest time before finally purchasing.  For one thing, there are two different flower patterns being modeled in the product's photos, so I was curious to see which one I would actually get.  As it turns out, I got a completely different flower pattern, as you can see.  That's all well and good, but I had to wash this dress before trying it on; it absolutely REEKED of a chemical stench when it arrived.  Plus, I was quite disappointed to see that the dress color is not as white as it appears in the photos, but has a yellowish off-white tinge instead.  The inner slip is very short; it barely covers my butt.

Other than that, it's a rather nice summer dress.  I'm 5'5" and I ordered the small, and it fits me perfectly.  The slit comes up about halfway up my thigh, and the straps are more comfortable worn on the shoulders than on the arms, as it is shown in the product's photos.  3 stars.

reviewText:
I am IN LOVE with this dress.  I wore it to work today because I was so pleased with it.  So far, I've gotten SO many compliments.  People have stopped me on the street to talk about how much they love this dress!  I paired it with some black lace heels, and I feel gorgeous!  It fits perfectly, and it wears great.  I really love the way that it looks on me.  The skirt is knee length, and the sleeves don't come down quite as far as they do in the picture.  In the picture, the sleeves come down past the model's elbows.  Mine come right to my elbows, but I don't think the sleeve length detracts in any way.  The blue lace is gorgeous.

There is a zipper in the back that goes the entire length up, and I had to get help zipping it up (and down).  There are also buttons in the front.  I have a large bust, and the buttons pucker a little, but I knew they would when I ordered the dress.  I'm in the process of losing weight, so that won't be an issue for much longer, I think.

I really can't say enough nice things about this.  So far, the worst thing about this dress is that the tags on the neckline are a little itchy.  I can live with itchy tags (or cut them out)!

I received this product at a discount in exchange for a fair and honest review.

reviewText:
Nice arm sleeves... Son needed these to protect his arms while playing soccer.  My son is allergic to certain rays of the sun and will break out of exposed to the sun for too long.  The nylon material is stretchy and stays on his arms as he plays his game.  They are easy to pull up and take off. No had no problem throwing his sleeves in and air dry.  The sleeves are white with a black caps on the upper portion of the sleeves.  My son noticed significantly less breakout with these sleeve and he had worried about getting to hot while playing, but he had no problem.  He said he had also less skin irritation while using.

I received the product for a reduced fee in return for my unbiased opinion.  The views expressed in this review at my own unbiased honest opinion of this product and was not compensated in any For it.
AOK!

Having children who are very active in sports, having these compression sleeves is a huge help on game day.  When they first arrived, we immediately noticed that they were really well made and felt quite nice on his arms.  The elastic at the top hold them in place nicely; we have had no issues with them moving out of place.

 As a little league pitcher, his arm is often quite tired at the end of games and practices, but since he has been using these, he seems to be able to play more effectively even in the games that go extra innings.  My son has reported that his arm not only feels less tired, but also recovers quicker after a long week of practice and games.  As we live in a cold region of the country, it has not yet been warm enough to notice much of a cooling feeling, however, the quality of these leads me to believe they will work as advertised.

All in all, we are very happy with the quality and function of this product, and we highly recommend them.  I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I got these cooling sleeves for my very active son.  He plays outdoor sports every single day and also sweats heavily, so I had hopes that these sleeves would help with the sweating and rashes that come from the constant motion of his arms.  He normally wears a Youth XL or an Adult Small, so we went with the latter.  The sleeves were a good fit, but he felt that the elastic around the top was a bit uncomfortable.  To correct that, he pulled them over the ends of the short sleeves on his shirt, which worked well for him.

We both noticed that he wasn't quite as sweaty after wearing these sleeves, and he commented that though they didn't necessarily keep his arms cool, they did keep him more comfortable by allowing the sweat to dry faster, so he didn't feel as sticky.  An unintended bonus was discovered when he slid in the dirt, and the sleeves prevented his arms from getting scraped up.

We are especially happy to have these sleeves now that summer is approaching to help prevent mosquito bites as well as harmful UV rays that can cause skin damage.  The fabric seems very durable.  I have washed them several times already and they are holding up very well, so they will definitely be an often-used item in our household.

I received this product at no cost in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.  My review is based solely on my honest opinion of the product and is not influenced by the promotion.
summary: Nice sleeves that help with sweating

Mine were also made in the USA, which seems to be a problem for some, as their pants were made in china.

The material is where I find the problem.  The grainline was different for the pants and the foldover waist.  It reminds me of a shiny pair of biker shorts from the 80s.  They hide no flaws.  The shine to the material shows everything.  I would rather have a velvet pair or a non shiny polyester, or even cotton, but not this.

Our teenage, volleyball-playing son ordered this shirt in time for its delivery prior to the 4th of July, and it was absolutely perfect for his needs.

Since reviewers typically note that this shirt's size can run small, we requested a Large even though he typically wears an adult Medium T-shirt (he likes them to be snug). Upon arrival, our son unpacked this shirt and put it on, wearing it around for the rest of the day... then washing it and wearing it again all day on the 4th of July.

It looks fantastic on him; he is a skinny volleyball player with broad shoulders and almost no body fat, and the shape, style and pattern of this shirt made him look more 'hunky' than he otherwise looks like in a plain white t-shirt or his v-ball uniform. He loved that!

If you are looking for a t-shirt of this theme, size, style, construction and price, then I would highly recommend giving this one a try based on our son's experience with it so far.  we plan to look at the seller's other shirts to see if there are similar offerings that he might like for his birthday.

reviewText:
This is an awesome shirt! We are huge Avengers fans and thought this shirt looked awesome. My husband has worn it about 7 times now and gets tons of compliments every single time. Yesterday he wore it in the 4th of July parade and it was perfect. He had three other guys ask where he got it.

My husband got this in a large, which is what size he normally wears. It fits great. Not too tight, not too loose. It looks great on him! The material is good, but about what you'd expect from a $17.99 novelty shirt. He had thought of using it as a workout shirt, but hasn't done that yet. I think he's worried about having people ask him about it all the time at the gym and interrupt his workouts.

Overall, it's an all around awesome shirt. We were sent it for testing and review purposes. That never influences my reviews. I always write what I honestly think about a product based on using it and comparing quality to price.
summary: My husband loves this shirt, he looks like such a stud in it!

3 stars, this is the most conflicted review I've written. Let me start off with saying that the product itself actually deserves a 5 star rating bc it's very well designed, with nice material that is very comfortable against your skin. Further it's very comfortable to wear & has several adjustments to allow you to loosen or tighten the corset, which is a nice feature. Be sure to pay close attention to the size chart, as it suggests ordering at least one size larger. Which I did, or so I thought, and it was too small. I can tell you that in the end, thier customer service came thru leaving me 100% satisfied. I reordered going up on size and just received it today and here's why my review is 3 stars; of course I couldn't wait to put/try it on, it fits for the most part, it's a little big on the bottom even at the tightest hooks. Then I noticed that it's not the exact same corset, even though I ordered the same one, only a bigger size. This one the backing is like a nylon mesh, as opposed to the full back being made in the same material as the front & corset belt, and the 'panty' bottom is also different. While I still haven't received the corset as described & as I've seen from the 1st corset, I'm going to keep this one, may give it to one of my daughters, and continue my search. Definitely worth the money if you can get one that fits you.

reviewText:
I was originally reluctant to order because this bag because it didn't have prime shipping, but I was proven wrong. It came much earlier than the predicted delivery dates, and it really went beyond my expectations.

It's very cute in person. It's not nearly as shiny as the photo makes it look and cat is not white but a cream, which I think is better anyway. It's hard to see in the photo, but the bell is a lovely sparkly material which is a really nice touch.

It may be because I'm a little on the shorter side, but the straps are the perfect length for me to wear over my shoulder and still be able to get my hand in to get keys, chap stick, etc. Also, the interior can be zippered shut, as well there is a smaller pocket inside which has a zipper, and an exterior one too.

This bag is surprisingly spacious. I fit a large wallet, change purse, planner, and a small makeup bag and still have some room. Over the weekend I managed to fit my wallet and a fall jacket inside without the bag looking overstuffed.

Like some other reviewers, my bag had a slight unpleasant smell, but this quickly went away for me.

reviewText:
I would not recommend anyone purchasing this batman hoodie. My fist problem with it is the coloring, the batman symbol is not yellow/gold as it appears in the picture. It is more of a spray paint gold, that looks cheap and like it will flake off if you washed it. My second issue is the actual fabric the hoodie is made with. It looks like the hoodie is made with a different material, more of a fleece blanket material, while the rest is more of a cheap Hanes sweat pant material. It make the overall construction appear very cheap. The material also feels odd and has a weird odor to it. I did order up in size so that it would fit. But alas that is also a problem I have. I am 5'1 and weight 120lbs, I bought an XL because based on the size chart, that is what I needed. Well, the sleeves are almost to short and the body is too big. I am afraid to wash it and shrink it, because then the sleeves will be way to short. Considering it took almost 2 full weeks for it to arrive and then to have a sub-par product is disappointing. Not to mention I think it would be heart breaking to any other Batman fan, to think they are getting a fun, cool hoodie and they end up with something they could have made themselves for $5.00 at the local craft store.
I did receive this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review of the product
summary: I would not recommend anyone purchasing this batman hoodie

Great tie

don't dress up often, but when I do, I like to wear a good tie to accent my outfit. I prefer thin style styles that don't detract too much from the outfit but still provides a good accent color. I got this solid cotton tie to pair with a few of my solid white and black outfits.

This tie is made out of cotton and came in just a small plastic bag. I would recommend taking the tie out of its packaging and use a fabric steamer to steam it once over to get the creases out. This tie is made out of cotton, so steaming it should be OK. Since it is cotton, you can also get by with gently hand washing it if it gets dirty and not have to worry about dry cleaning. The tie itself is pretty sharp looking. It is a dark deep red that pairs well with white or black solids. Since it's not as fancy as a silk tie, I wouldn't wear it to a formal formal occasion. Outside of super fancy occasions, this tie should work for any other events.

Overall, I really like this tie. It is sharp looking and cleans easily. I will be pairing it with my solid white shirts.
summary: I like to wear a good tie to accent my outfit

I am 5'5 and it hits mid thigh on me. It cuts in towards the waist so it eliminates the possibility of a boxy look and actually shows your shape some. I will say that if I wasn't pregnant and expecting to get much larger I would have ordered the XL. I believe it runs true to size and XL is what I normally wear.  I was very hesitant to buy more than one at first but now I will be buying them in several colors. I highly recommend this shirt.

The fabric itself is very thin/cheap and feels gross when I touch it. Also, there are threads already coming loose from the seams right out of the packaging. In the photos, I have one compared to my Cheshire Cat pillowcase which was sort of what I was expecting- black and white, crisp lines, sketchy details. You can see that obviously, the Octopus curtain is far from that. It is the same color as my sheets! NOT WHAT I WANTED AT ALL. My camera actually made it look a lot better than it looks in person, but hopefully they help. The seller quickly resolved my issue, but I am still unhappy that I did not receive the curtain I was promised.

reviewText:
I purchased this for my infant and I thought it was a really cute design so I decided to order.  It arrived faster than promised in the mail and was well packaged to prevent any kind of damage or getting wet.
  As soon as this little outfit arrived, I opened it right up and it was really cute.  Looks just like the picture. I checked it over thoroughly to make sure there was no damage such as rips or tears, holes, or imperfections and I am happy that I was able to find no issues.
  The seams are evenly sewn and the snap buttons are well attached and white in color. The material was not cheap and is really soft.  It is recommended that this should be washed by hand but I threw this in the washer on gentle/cold cycle and put it on low in the dryer and had no issues.  It didn't shrink either.  The only issue is that it runs a little big but with babies, they grow so fast it really doesn't matter. I did purchase this with a discount and this is my honest opinion of this outfit. Right now this is for sale at the discounted price of $11.99 and I think that's a fair price and I would recommend this cute little outfit.  Would make a nice baby shower gift as well.

I purchased the Big Elephant One Piece Baby Boys Long Sleeve Striped Romper Pajamas D94 for my nephew for when he is at my house and I am watching him. I absolutely love this outfit on him. The nautical theme is so cute and perfect for summer and boating. So far this has been an easy outfit to wear and clean. I do air dry this outfit because I am afraid the red anchor embellishment would get too hot in the drier and may peel off and so far this has held up in quality. I would definitely recommend this product to any family with children. Disclosure I was provided with a discount to purchase and test this product in an exchange to write and share my honest and unbiased review. I am not affiliated with this company and I did not promise to write a positive review when the offer was made. I tested this product thoroughly and do my best to provide detailed reviews to other Amazon customers so they may make informed decisions about their future purchases. These opinions are 100% mine. It is my intent to highlight features and drawbacks that I, as a consumer, would want to know about before I purchase the product, not to inflate the product's quality for the distributor or manufacturer to increase their sales. Regardless, I only recommend products or services I use personally and believe. The opinions above are my own and were not influenced in any way. Others experience may vary. If you found this review helpful, I would appreciate it if you click yes.

reviewText:
This Big Elephant One Piece Baby Boys Long Sleeve Striped Romper Pajamas is so cute for my little grandson. The snaps are plastic but I have found them to be durable on other infant clothing I have purchased. I immediately opened the packaging when I got it and inspected the item for damages and / or defects. I didn't find any, though there was a somewhat "chemical" odor to it. I'm not really sure if it was from the plastic or from the clothing? So I promptly washed it by hand as recommended and the smell did go away. The material of the romper is very soft and pliable and is 100% cotton?Another reason I wouldn't wash in the washing machine or dryer. It seems perfect for baby wear. The material does not have any bad sewing or threads sticking out. The anchor is an iron on decoration.  But it's really cute. I would buy from this company again.

 I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I've opted to not put it in the dryer because I'm afraid the anchor will buckle. Although the item is long sleeved, don't buy it for the warmth. I live in Florida, so it is not a problem, but the material is a light weight cotton blend of some kind. I like it well enough to keep it on hand for everyday wear, but nothing more.

This is probably the 12th wig I've bought from Amazon, most cheaper, some more expensive. This is by far the cheapest looking one I've gotten. I wear wigs to work frequently and I don't mind looking like I'm wearing a wig, but not like one I bought at a Halloween store. Most people who don't know me don't realize I'm wearing wigs.

Pros: The color. The blue is exactly how it looks on my monitor. It's hard to find a long blue wig that isn't dark blue or a very bright lighter blue. If this had been any other color, I would have returned it.

Cons: The fit is weird and lumpy. It's the first wig that has fit me this way so I'd say I have an average head. Using the snaps didn't help, and in fact if anything made the lumps more pronounced. It is a full wig at the bottom but the top is very thin! I've never had a wig before where you could see the wefts/base of the wig before! It would have helped if the base wasn't such a light/peachy color which is also problematic at the front hairline.

If you're wearing a hat over it the lumpiness and thin top won't be apparent, but I tried that and my hat kept sliding off. I'll keep searching for a decent blue wig.
summary: Unless you're wearing this under a hat, keep looking!

reviewText:
This necklace is okay at best.  In a minimalist pendant like this, all the focus is on the stone and setting.  However, there are three main issues:

1.)  The stone is dull---there is no "fire."  I have the dark blue version, and it doesn't have very much life to it.  You can barely even tell it's translucent or blue---it almost looks like opaque black instead of sapphire-colored.

2.)  The setting is a big problem, due to the deep ladle-like shape.  The deep bowl can't lay flat on your neckline, so it wobbles off to one side or the other.  It almost never faces forward properly, and tips to the side very easily.  (See photos.)  The giant, oversized bail doesn't help either.  Since it's so loose on the chain, and narrow in width, there's nothing to help the pendant sit correctly.

3.)  The chain isn't great.  It's a strange type of link---I don't know what it is, maybe some type of cardano link?  It's the slightly stiff kind that doesn't *bend* all the way, if you know what I mean.

The quality of the setting, as well as the narrow band of clear accent crystals, is decent.  In another color, this necklace would probably be better---perhaps a color that lets more light through.  Since mine doesn't have any sparkle, it's a forgettable piece of jewelry.
summary: Dull stone, no "fire," and pendant constantly tips over to one side.

reviewText: This is actually very pretty. I am impressed especially at this low price. I got the Green one and it is a very bold Emerald Green color. This is a small pendant but it adds a nice touch of color. It measures about 0.8 inches long. The crystal is about 9 mm in size. That crystal is nice and secure because it has all those prongs holding it in place. I like that. The metal behind the crystal is also nicely decorated. There are shapes cut out from the metal. Lots of pretty little details. I am happy with the chain I received. It is a thin chain but it matches well with the pendant. Mine has a spring ring clasp. All the metal used for this is plated alloy. The plating is well done and doesn't look cheap. This looks better in person than in the pictures. I am very happy with it. It even came in a nice gift box. *****DISCLOSURE: Free item received to evaluate and review. All opinions are my own.

This necklace is very beautiful! It has its own fashion statement to where I don't have to say much about it. It speaks for itself. The chain compliments the color and design very well And Its easy to put on and off. It is the perfect length for myself to wear. I love the fact that this necklace will be great Christmas present! You can never have enough jewelry. This one glistens no matter what you are doing and where you are. It has its own statements!

reviewText:
I was really impressed by this outfit. First off let me say it is one size fits all. However the tags all say L, which I'm assuming means Large. If it's large then it's a junior's large, not women's.

The skirt doesn't have much stretch to the waistband. I measured it and stretches roughly 34 inches in size at the waist, any larger than that will be a tight fit, so I'd measure yourself before buying.

The top however is very stretchy, I was worried it was going to be too big on me but it's adjustable and fit on the smallest setting. Just laid out, it measures 28 inches long but will stretch well beyond that. It has nice coverage with adjustable straps. It you're trying to wear in public you might need nipple covers, it's barely traslucent.

The thong ties on the sides so it will adjust to any size body. It's a nice quality, not the dinky elastic string kind you get with many of these outfits. And the hat is double layered so it's nice and thick, which surprised me. It can easily stand up on its own once you unflatten it.

Overall I am very pleased with this outfit. It's very classy and well made, and looks really sexy on. I'm 5'4" and 115 pounds so I didn't have any trouble with it fitting, but one size fits all doesn't always ring true and the lack of stretch in the skirt is going to limit who can wear this. So keep that in mind before buying. Otherwise I think you'll be pleased with it, I know I am!

I did receive this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review, but the opinions and critique are my own and are based on my personal experience with this product. This is also the reason there may not be a "Verified Purchase" label on this review. I am under no obligation to provide a positive review and received no incentives or rewards for doing so. I have zero loyalty to the company providing me items to test, and I have no affiliation with the seller. I do not receive payment or compensation of any kind. My reviews are unbiased, and although I have received the item at a discounted price, I do not give good ratings on anything that I would not be willing to shell out my hard earned cash. I give products the rating I feel they deserve based on my experience with the product and compared to other similar products. My aim is to highlight features and drawbacks that I would want to know about as a buyer, not hype the product for the seller/manufacturer to increase sales. I test and try out the product thoroughly and do my best to provide detailed reviews to other customers so they may make informed decisions. The quality is amazing, especially if you're in a work setting that doesn't lend well to expensive jewelry! If you're on the fence, go ahead and buy this! You won't regret it!

reviewText: Nice, but just smaller than we thought

I ordered this for Christmas.  (I bought it so I peaked of course, actually, more than peaked but . . .)  It looks amazing, better than the pictures even on the Isobrite site.  It is stylish, classy, and the way it looks in the dark is fantastic!  It has both the tritium t100 markers and some regular, high luminosity markers on the dial.  They have the coolest 3D look in the dark because they are all at different levels - bezel, hands, and markers.

Does the tritium live up to its claims?  Yes.  It is constantly luminescent, bright but not superbright.  It's just right and blows away the Luminox.  If they don't switch to t100, this company will take their business.  I actually wanted Luminox when I started doing my research and discovered this.  This is 4x brighter and lasts 50 years.  Other brands Luminox, Nite, Traser only last 25 years.  Its a no brainer.  And yes, it's safe.

What else?
Armourlite makes very sturdy watches with good shock proofing.
It has superior swiss movement to the vast majority of watches on the market with Ronda 715L not the normal Ronda 540D.
It is waterproof to 1000 feet!  Seriously.
it has a sapphire crystal which I require.  Who wants a scratched up expensive watch?
Battery life is 10 years.  Why get solar or autowind?  And the wearable electronic watches need constant charging, and are fragile.
Crown is double gasket and screw in with side shields.
Case and band are stainless and feel very comfortable on.  ( I have a nice Seiko with stainless and that is the only way to go for me.)
Its not too big at 46mm - better than comparable Luminox and G-shocks- and I am not a big guy.
It can be worn for special occasions and formal wear, and as an everyday go-to because it's almost indestructible (stainless/sapphire/ water resistant to 1000feet).  It is a hefty watch.
It looks really classy.  Although I set out for a blackened look, this is actually better because the rose gold makes the watch stand out less on the wrist, and for a watch this size that is a good thing.  I would prefer this a bit blacker.  I am going to but some black, ceramic paint dots on the extra dots between 12 and 3:00 o'clock.
It Doesn't have all those extra dials for things you never use.  I know I don't use them, cell phones do those things better.

I do not work for Armourlite/Isobrite, and I received no incentive to write this review.  I just really like the watch.
summary: This watch is Awesome!  I love it.

Both dresses came from this seller, how can they be constructed so differently? reviewText: It's doing exactly what I bought it for.
Did not receive the bag pictured. Very disappointed. This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

When I ordered this bag I chose the blue one.  However, on the order page it showed the name of the blue bag, but with the pink picture.  When I tried to switch to the pink bag it named the pink bag but showed the blue picture.  As such I had no idea what I was going to get, but was hoping for the blue one.  In the end I received the pink bag.  While it was not my first choice, I do enjoy the bag and can make the color work.  I think the seller has since fixed that glitch in the ordering process but I would suggest making sure the picture and the name of the color are one and the same.  If not, you will get whatever color the picture shows, and not the name of the color.

WHAT I LIKE ABOUT THIS BAG
 Fun, casual bag
 Spacious
 Adjustable shoulder strap
 Zippered pocket on back of purse
 Can be worn as a shoulder or cross body bag
 Affordable

WHAT I DO NOT LIKE AS MUCH ABOUT THE BAG
 Lining gets stuck in the zipper a lot
 Cheap looking vinyl trims
 Lacks pockets/dividers on the inside of the bag

Overall it is a fun, casual bag that is perfect for short over nighters or to take to the park or other such outings.  Spacious enough for the gym as well.  While I received this bag for free in exchange for my review I rate all products based on their full retail price.  I rate this bag 4 stars based on quality, features, price and durability.

I received this product as a gift from a friend and did not buy this myself on Amazon, but thought I would review it. Overall I like this brand having bought other sunglasses myself and so my friend got this for me

PROS
-Nice round shape, there is an overall style to these glasses
-Construction is sold when handled with care and there are no flimsy parts or loose screw
-Comes with a nice pouch that can be used to clean the lens in addition to offering some protection
-They stay on my face well even when I look down and while running - I try this with all sunglasses
-The lens color and frame color go well together, very cool looking and great for blocking out sunlight

CONS
-My face is more angular so I don't think it fits it the best, more suitable for a rounder face and so keep that in mind

Disclaimer: This was bought in exchange for an honest review.
summary: Solid cool looking sunglasses that work

This belt has the same problem I've had with every other ratchet belt I've ever bought. It's just not the right size.

I'm a 31" waist so I ordered the 26"-35" size. Right out of the box it has like 8"-10" of extra length just flopping around. So you're supposed to trim it down to your waist size. Well, when you trim it to a decent length (like 3"-4" of extra length beyond the buckle) it becomes too short to reach the ratcheting mechanism.

So you either have to wear it mega tight, or have like 6" of extra belt and look like a weirdo.

Worthless.

So firstly, I have to say that I love love love the design of this bathing suit. I think the title is a bit wrong to say "push up" swimsuit because, the point of a push up is to show more, but this does not. It has a very nice hold if that is what they mean! So as far as just discussing the designs and patterns on the suit, it is really cute. The fit of the top is very nice, exactly my size (M). The straps that criss cross in the back are a bit annoying but it's very doable. (Going to give some weird weird weird tan lines that is for sure!). The material of the top seems nice and strong. I have a problem with the cups in the bathing suit. It isn't the best quality and the cup inserts inside of the top are kind of just flying around and very very noticeable. As far as the bottoms go, I do not like them. I got  the bottoms with the three strings on each side and I just hate the design. I got a medium, and yet these swimsuit bottoms fit like a small. If they were the right size I think I would like it more because it would not look so tight and ill-fitted. This product takes a while to get to you and they do not exactly show care when wrapping it up. Over all this product definitely gets a 3 star review because the material is not horrendous, but could be better, the fit is just either perfect for the top , or WAY too tight for the bottoms, and the time it took to get here was a while. I will still obviously wear this top out, but I doubt that I will be wearing these bottoms in public because they are just not comfortable because of the false size and they do not look good. DISCLAIMER: I was given this product at a discount to give my HONEST review, and that is what I do each time whether the product was good or bad.

reviewText:
This is absolutely awful on me, not flattering in the least. I am a size 4/6, 5'3", and there was about 8" of extra fabric at the bust, the armholes dangled several inches too low, and the sleeves were about 3" inches above my wrist (in the garment's defense I do have long arms). The material quality was OK, an opaque crepe; and the lace quality was pretty good, sturdy and not very scratchy. I would have kept it and altered myself if not for the too-short arms.
The dress you see is not what you receive. The picture is of a designer apparel item. I was not expecting the designer item, but i was expecting something closer to it than what i got. It was packaged very nicely in a heavy resealable (ziplock style) plastic bag.
Steer clear of this one unless you have about a 38" bust, average to narrow shoulders, and shorter arms; thicker arms should be OK. If you're under 5'4" this is a good length for a mini dress, taller ladies will find it a good tunic length.
EDIT: Added picture. The company also contacted me regarding my negative review. They didn't ask me to change it or anything, but offered me a discount for a different item of my choice. I added a star for the attention paid to customer satisfaction.

I needed several new swimsuits for a trip to the Dominican.  I really did not want to spend crazy amounts of money.  I did my reading of all reviews of anything I ordered.  However, I was still nervous.  I have to say of the four suits I purchased from Runbox...I was extremely pleased!  I will warn you that these suits run very very small.  I took the time to read through and find customers who reported being my size and looking at the photos as well as the size that they ordered.  I typically wear a sz 14 or Large to Extra Large.  I am 5'8...185 pounds and bust size is 36DD.  The 3XL fit perfect.

What I feel was most impressive was the quality.  I had not in any way expected this.  These swimsuits are better quality by far than something I would have purchased from Target or Khols.  I know I will be wearing them for several seasons.

If there was one issue of concern...it was the clasp.  It is very simple and therefore I stressed that it would unexpectedly come undone.  However, this never happened and by the second full day on the beach I realized that I had no reason for concern.

I will be ordering from Runbox in the future!

Pretty surprised at how much I didn't like this watch.  Coming off of the Apple Watch, I wanted something a little less expensive.  You definitely get what you pay for.  The apps are not really iOS friendly.  The phone app and the watch themselves are in a different language, so it is hard to set up.  Not a lot of bells and whistles, or customization available.

If you are looking for a cheap smart watch that preforms basic tasks, then ignore my 3 star rating and go buy this watch! However, I was personally looking for a cheap imitation of an Apple Watch, and was disappointed with the product I received (again, with the standards of an Apple Watch in mind). The watch itself is bulky in nature, and looked very large on my small wrist. The functionality itself is clear and straightforward with a simple operating system and plain appearance. However, it was a bit too basic for me, and not as interactive as I'd like. Yes, you can make/receive phone calls and get your notifications straight from your phone, and even take photos, among other things. However, the messaging app on my specific watch did not work, so I was disappointed in not being able to experience that feature. The battery life is great, and the band is comfortable. However, this product just was not for me and I ended up returning it after trying it out for a while to try and get used to it. I would say this is a great watch for a man who is not into fancy interactive electronics but still wants to be up to date. The watch itself is just too bulky and manly in nature for a girl, in my opinion.
summary: Not for me, but still a decent product!

reviewText:
My husband is a novice runner and my daughter runs with him, but is also a dancer. Between the two of them, we get a lot of sores, sprains, pulled muscles, etc. I like to have an assortment of braces, compression sleeves and such on hand so when they need them, I don't have to make a special trip to the store. These sleeves are pretty good. They don't have any chemical smells to them. They feel comfortable to wear and do offer nice support. The fit my thin daughter very well. My husband was able to stretch them to fit on his thighs. I don't need them, but I tried to put them on myself but they would not fit on my plus size thighs. They are well made & easy to care for.

*I received these for free in exchange for my honest & unbiased review. My thoughts & opinions are my own.

reviewText: Very Sexy.

First off I have to say I am obsessed with anything Egyptian as I am sure most people are and so when I saw these leggings I just had to have them and I couldn't be happier with them the quality and fit are more than I could have hoped for considering how affordable they are. I own other leggings and to be honest M&Z has really out ranked all of them. I love how the print depicts an Egyptian man giving flowers to an Egyptian woman and the colors are so vibrant even after washing. The sewing is done very nicely there is only one seam on the inside of the leggings which I like. The elastic band is good quality and very comfortable on my waist. I really have nothing negative to say about them and to be honest I am shocked they are priced so low when I consider the quality. I do recommend them and as long as you are within the size range I feel you will like them too. These are one size fits all type but, for sizing sake I will say that I am 5'5" 116lbs and my waist is 29" and they fit me perfect without much stretching of the material at all. I am so happy with these and so lucky that I received them as a complementary sample in exchange for my evaluation of them and I totally scored on this one because, I am in love :) Thanks and have a great day! ~Kiki
summary: WALK LIKE AN EGYPTIAN IN COMFORT AND STYLE! :D

reviewText: After waiting almost a month for delivery, the dress I received was NOTHING like the picture or as described.  It was only midlength and the fabric was a very thin, cheap polyester/nylon and overall ugly.  The stripes were blue & gray and horizontal, not diagonal.  There was no striped waistband, just elastic smocking along the waist of the black bodice fabric.  It had a scoop neck, rather than a V neck. The plastic package it was in was not sealed and although the package said it was a size L, the dress was much smaller than that, no bigger than an M.  I expected it to run small as it is Asian sized, but this was beyond just running small.  I'm guessing that the dress I received was on that was returned by another customer and put in the wrong package to send it back. Unfortunately, my fiancee damaged the dress when he cut open the package so I am unable to even return it and hope for the right dress on the 2nd try.  I could have tried to salvage the damage but this dress was so far from what I ordered and such a bad quality that I just threw it away.
summary: Not the Dress in the Picture!!

That being said, I do like the top even so because it's got built-in padding (and NOT the kind that's just loose and stuffed into a haphazardly cut slot in the bra). The ties for around the neck and the band make it easier to adjust and help compensate for the wonky sizing. Print's nice but definitely looks better in the picture. The fabric's pretty standard for swimsuits which was a bit of a surprise. I figured the material would be pretty thin, but it's not. This particular size and print for whatever reason was only $7, so I'm deliriously happy about this purchase.

reviewText:

Pros :

1 )  this bathing suit really transforms your little one into a strawberry! The details on this suit are so cute! ! Strawberry drawstrings,  leaf details,  and adorable seed polka dots!  So fun!

2) fully lined and the lycra material is really thick!  This suit is made from pretty good materials,  especially for the price!  The material is far better than anything you would get at walmart!

Cons :

1 ) I was on the fence about saying that this runs a tiny bit big, but in the end said true to size.  Ultimately the bottom is a little big, but the top is 100% adjustable.  My daughter has a tiny butt, so I considered that. If your child has a bigger butt, this is true to size. Like everything else,  sizing can be a bit tricky,  but when in doubt, order true to size.

The hat seems to be good quality, but the "one size" with adjustable band was apparently no longer available (although it's still listed here on Amazon).  So the vendor sent me the flex fit hat instead. It is the L/XL, which fits me just okay...not great.  S/M would be too small for me. I'm not too impressed with the Flex Fit, honestly.  Although the band stretches well, there isn't much resistance, so the hat always feels a little loose. I admit that it's probably just a personal preference, so I don't want to be overly harsh.  I'll wear it, and I'll probably get used to it, too.
summary: Very nice hat but....adjustable band version no longer available.  Vendor sent me "flex fit". Not a huge fan.
